EU U-ORG
rejects O
German U-MISC
call O
to O
boycott O
British U-MISC
lamb O
. O

Peter B-PER
Blackburn L-PER

BRUSSELS U-LOC
1996-08-22 O

The O
European B-ORG
Commission L-ORG
said O
on O
Thursday O
it O
disagreed O
with O
German U-MISC
advice O
to O
consumers O
to O
shun O
British U-MISC
lamb O
until O
scientists O
determine O
whether O
mad O
cow O
disease O
can O
be O
transmitted O
to O
sheep O
. O

Germany U-LOC
's O
representative O
to O
the O
European B-ORG
Union L-ORG
's O
veterinary O
committee O
Werner B-PER
Zwingmann L-PER
said O
on O
Wednesday O
consumers O
should O
buy O
sheepmeat O
from O
countries O
other O
than O
Britain U-LOC
until O
the O
scientific O
advice O
was O
clearer O
. O

" O
We O
do O
n't O
support O
any O
such O
recommendation O
because O
we O
do O
n't O
see O
any O
grounds O
for O
it O
, O
" O
the O
Commission U-ORG
's O
chief O
spokesman O
Nikolaus B-PER
van I-PER
der I-PER
Pas L-PER
told O
a O
news O
briefing O
. O

He O
said O
further O
scientific O
study O
was O
required O
and O
if O
it O
was O
found O
that O
action O
was O
needed O
it O
should O
be O
taken O
by O
the O
European B-ORG
Union L-ORG
. O

He O
said O
a O
proposal O
last O
month O
by O
EU U-ORG
Farm O
Commissioner O
Franz B-PER
Fischler L-PER
to O
ban O
sheep O
brains O
, O
spleens O
and O
spinal O
cords O
from O
the O
human O
and O
animal O
food O
chains O
was O
a O
highly O
specific O
and O
precautionary O
move O
to O
protect O
human O
health O
. O

Fischler U-PER
proposed O
EU-wide U-MISC
measures O
after O
reports O
from O
Britain U-LOC
and O
France U-LOC
that O
under O
laboratory O
conditions O
sheep O
could O
contract O
Bovine B-MISC
Spongiform I-MISC
Encephalopathy L-MISC
( O
BSE U-MISC
) O
-- O
mad O
cow O
disease O
. O

But O
Fischler U-PER
agreed O
to O
review O
his O
proposal O
after O
the O
EU U-ORG
's O
standing O
veterinary O
committee O
, O
mational O
animal O
health O
officials O
, O
questioned O
if O
such O
action O
was O
justified O
as O
there O
was O
only O
a O
slight O
risk O
to O
human O
health O
. O

Spanish U-MISC
Farm O
Minister O
Loyola B-PER
de I-PER
Palacio L-PER
had O
earlier O
accused O
Fischler U-PER
at O
an O
EU U-ORG
farm O
ministers O
' O
meeting O
of O
causing O
unjustified O
alarm O
through O
" O
dangerous O
generalisation O
. O
" O

. O

Only O
France U-LOC
and O
Britain U-LOC
backed O
Fischler U-PER
's O
proposal O
. O

The O
EU U-ORG
's O
scientific O
veterinary O
and O
multidisciplinary O
committees O
are O
due O
to O
re-examine O
the O
issue O
early O
next O
month O
and O
make O
recommendations O
to O
the O
senior O
veterinary O
officials O
. O

Sheep O
have O
long O
been O
known O
to O
contract O
scrapie O
, O
a O
brain-wasting O
disease O
similar O
to O
BSE U-MISC
which O
is O
believed O
to O
have O
been O
transferred O
to O
cattle O
through O
feed O
containing O
animal O
waste O
. O

denied O

there O
was O
any O

to O

, O

" O

, O

of O

14.2 O
percent O
in O
July O
this O
year O
from O

, O

office I-ORG

. O

said O

new O

were O

in O

1996 O
-- O
304,850 O

cars O
and O
15,613 O

. O

The O

represent O
a O
13.6 O
percent O
increase O
for O

cars O
and O
a O
2.2 O
percent O
decline O
for O

from O
July O
1995 O
. O

32.7 O
percent O
in O
the O
period O
. O

was O

to O

. O

. O

, O

a O

. O

. O

" O

. O
" O

has O
led O

to O
ensure O
consumer O
protection O
tops O

of O

in O

, O

could O

a O

by O

. O

The O
European B-ORG
Commission L-ORG
agreed O
this O
month O
to O

a O

to O
ban O

use O
of O

. O

EU U-ORG
Farm O
Commissioner O
Franz B-PER

, O

Britain U-LOC
and O
France U-LOC
that O
under O
laboratory O
conditions O
sheep O
could O
contract O
Bovine B-MISC
Spongiform I-MISC
Encephalopathy L-MISC
( O
BSE U-MISC
) O
-- O
mad O
cow O
disease O
. O

But O
some O
members O
of O
the O
EU U-ORG
's O
standing O
veterinary O
committee O
questioned O
whether O
the O
action O
was O
necessary O
given O
the O
slight O
risk O
to O
human O
health O
. O

The O
question O
is O
being O
studied O
separately O
by O
two O
EU U-ORG
scientific O
committees O
. O

Sheep O
have O
long O
been O
known O
to O
contract O
scrapie O
, O
a O
similar O
brain-wasting O
disease O
to O
BSE U-MISC
which O
is O
believed O
to O
have O
been O
transferred O
to O
cattle O
through O
feed O
containing O
animal O
waste O
. O

British U-MISC
officials O
say O
sheep O
meat O
is O
perfectly O
safe O
to O
eat O
. O

ZDF U-ORG
said O
Germany U-LOC
imported O
47,600 O
sheep O
from O
Britain U-LOC
last O
year O
, O
nearly O
half O
of O
total O
imports O
. O

It O
brought O
in O
4,275 O
tonnes O
of O
British U-MISC
mutton O
, O
some O
10 O
percent O
of O
overall O
imports O
. O

After O
the O
British U-MISC
government O
admitted O
a O
possible O
link O
between O
mad O
cow O
disease O
and O
its O
fatal O
human O
equivalent O
, O
the O
EU U-ORG
imposed O
a O
worldwide O
ban O
on O
British U-MISC
beef O
exports O
. O

EU U-ORG
leaders O
agreed O
at O
a O
summit O
in O
June O
to O
a O
progressive O
lifting O
of O
the O
ban O

takes O
parallel O
measures O
to O
eradicate O
the O
disease O
. O

TENNIS O
- O
NEWCOMBE U-PER
PONDERS O
HIS O
DAVIS B-MISC
CUP L-MISC
FUTURE O
. O

SYDNEY U-LOC
1996-08-22 O

Australian U-MISC
Davis B-MISC
Cup L-MISC
captain O
John B-PER
Newcombe L-PER
on O
Thursday O
signalled O
his O
possible O
resignation O
if O
his O
team O
loses O
an O
away O
tie O
against O
Croatia U-LOC
next O
month O
. O

The O
former O
Wimbledon U-MISC
champion O
said O
the O
immediate O
future O
of O
Australia U-LOC
's O
Davis B-MISC
Cup L-MISC
coach O
Tony B-PER
Roche L-PER
could O
also O
be O
determined O
by O
events O
in O
Split U-LOC
. O

" O
If O
we O
lose O
this O
one O
, O
Tony U-PER
and O
I O
will O
have O
to O
have O
a O
good O
look O
at O
giving O
someone O
else O
a O
go O
, O
" O
Newcombe U-PER
was O
quoted O
as O
saying O
in O

's O
Daily B-ORG
Telegraph L-ORG
newspaper O
. O

Australia U-LOC
face O
Croatia U-LOC
in O
the O
world O
group O
qualifying O
tie O
on O
clay O
from O
September O
20-22 O
. O

Under O
Newcombe U-PER
's O
leadership O
, O
Australia U-LOC
were O
relegated O
from O
the O
elite O
world O
group O
last O
year O
, O
the O
first O
time O
the O
26-time O
Davis B-MISC
Cup L-MISC
winners O
had O
slipped O
from O
the O
top O
rank O
. O

Since O
taking O
over O
as O
captain O
from O
Neale B-PER
Fraser L-PER
in O
1994 O
, O
Newcombe U-PER
's O
record O
in O
tandem O
with O
Roche U-PER
, O
his O
former O
doubles O
partner O
, O
has O
been O
three O
wins O
and O
three O
losses O
. O

Newcombe U-PER
has O
selected O
Wimbledon U-MISC
semifinalist O
Jason B-PER
Stoltenberg L-PER
, O
Patrick B-PER
Rafter L-PER
, O
Mark B-PER
Philippoussis L-PER
, O
and O
Olympic U-MISC
doubles O
champions O
Todd B-PER

and O
Mark B-PER

to O
face O
the O
Croatians U-MISC
. O

The O
home O
side O
boasts O
world O
number O
six O
Goran B-PER

, O
and O

conceded O

would O
be O

to O
beat O
the O
Croatian U-MISC
number O
one O
. O

" O

to O
fight O
to O
our O
last O

-- O
Australia U-LOC
must O
play O
at O
its O
absolute O
best O
to O
win O

" O

, O

he O
has O

- O

' O
MANAGER O
DAVEY B-PER
JOHNSON L-PER
HOSPITALIZED O
. O

BALTIMORE U-LOC
1996-08-22 O

Baltimore B-ORG
Orioles L-ORG
manager O
Davey B-PER
Johnson L-PER
will O
miss O
Thursday O
night O
's O
game O
against O
the O
Seattle B-ORG
Mariners L-ORG
after O
being O
admitted O
to O
a O
hospital O
with O
an O

heartbeat O
. O

The O
53-year-old O
Johnson U-PER
was O
hospitalized O
after O
experiencing O
dizziness O
. O

" O
He O
is O
in O
no O
danger O
and O
will O
be O
treated O
and O
observed O
this O
evening O
, O
" O

William B-PER

that O
Johnson U-PER
is O
expected O
to O
be O
released O
on O
Friday O
. O

Orioles U-ORG
' O

Andy B-PER
Etchebarren L-PER
will O
manage O
the O
club O
in O
Johnson U-PER
's O

. O

is O
the O
second O
manager O
to O
be O
hospitalized O
this O
week O
after O
California B-ORG
Angels L-ORG
skipper O
John B-PER

was O
admitted O
to O
New B-LOC
York L-LOC

Columbia B-LOC
Presbyterian I-LOC
Hospital L-LOC
on O
Wednesday O
with O
a O
blood O
clot O
in O
his O
left O
calf O
. O

Johnson U-PER
, O
who O
played O
eight O
seasons O
in O
Baltimore U-LOC
, O
was O
named O
Orioles U-ORG
manager O
in O
the O
off-season O
replacing O
Phil B-PER
Regan L-PER
. O

He O
led O
the O
Cincinnati B-ORG
Reds L-ORG
to O
the O
National B-MISC
League I-MISC
Championship I-MISC
Series L-MISC
last O
year O
and O
guided O
the O
New B-ORG
York I-ORG
Mets L-ORG
to O
a O

championship O
in O
1986 O
. O

has O
won O
16 O
of O

games O

. O

BASEBALL O
- O

by O

' O
FIRST O

. O

COLOMBO U-LOC

police O

patrolled O
the O
ground O
when O

opened O
their O

of O
Sri B-LOC
Lanka L-LOC
with O
a O

win O
over O
the O
country O
's O
youth O
team O
on O
Thursday O
. O

Australia U-LOC
, O
in O
Sri B-LOC
Lanka L-LOC
for O
a O
limited O
overs O
tournament O
which O
also O
includes O
India U-LOC
and O
Zimbabwe U-LOC
, O
have O
been O
promised O
the O

of O

, O

dogs O
and O

to O

They O
are O
making O
their O
first O
visit O
to O
the O
island O
since O

a O
World B-MISC
Cup L-MISC
fixture O
in O

because O
of O
fears O
over O

. O

, O

first O
in O
Thursday O

the O

match O

scored O
251 O
for O
seven O
from O

overs O
. O

led O
the O
way O
with O
100 O
off O
119 O
balls O
with O
two O
sixes O
and O
nine O
fours O
before O

. O

The O
youth O
side O
replied O
with O
246 O
for O
seven O
. O

Geoff B-PER

he O
was O
impressed O
with O

. O

to O

to O

, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

in O

a O

( O

) O
that O

under O

. O

RICHMOND U-LOC
, O
Va U-LOC
. O

1996-08-22 O

Best B-ORG
Products I-ORG
Co L-ORG
Chairman O
and O
Chief O
Executive O
Daniel B-PER
Levy L-PER
said O
Thursday O
he O
expected O

company O
's O
second-quarter O

to O
be O

to O
the O
$ O
34.6 O
million O
loss O
posted O
in O
the O
first O
quarter O
. O

He O
also O
told O

before O
the O

's O

that O
the O
second O
quarter O
could O
be O
better O
than O
the O
first O
quarter O
ended O
May O
4 O
. O
" O

We O
could O
do O
even O
better O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

The O
second-quarter O
results O
are O
expected O
to O
be O
released O
in O
September O
. O

Levy U-PER
said O
seeking O
bankruptcy O
protection O
was O
not O
under O
consideration O
. O

Best U-ORG
emerged O
from O
Chapter B-MISC
11 L-MISC
bankruptcy O
protection O
in O
June O
1994 O
after O
3-1/2 O
years O
. O

" O
Bankruptcy O
is O
always O
possible O
, O
particularly O
when O
you O
lose O
what O
we O
are O
going O
to O
lose O
in O
the O
first O
half O
of O
this O
year O
, O
" O
Levy U-PER
said O
. O
" O

But O
this O
is O
not O
something O
we O
are O
striving O
to O
do O
. O
" O

The O
Richmond-based U-MISC
retailer O
lost O
$ O
95.7 O
million O
in O
the O
fiscal O
year O
ended O
February O
3 O
. O

That O
was O
the O
second-largest O
loss O
in O
the O
company O
's O
history O
. O

Levy U-PER
said O
that O
Best U-ORG
planned O
to O
open O
two O
new O
stores O
this O
fall O
. O

The O
company O
announced O
in O
March O
that O
it O
was O
closing O
seven O

and O
backing O
out O
of O
nine O

lease O

. O

the O
time O
, O

said O
it O
did O
not O
plan O
to O
open O
any O
new O

may O
have O
babies O

risk O
of O

's O
disease O

disorder O
, O

on O

. O

Three O
out O
of O
four O

babies O
born O
to O

developed O
serious O
cases O
of O

's O
disease O

. O

Dr O
Andrew B-PER
Wakefield L-PER
of O

, O

while O

. O

" O

of O

had O
Crohn U-PER
's O

" O

is O

of O

can O

cases O
. O

Garlic O
pills O
do O
n't O
lower O
cholesterol O
, O
study O
finds O
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-22 O

Garlic O
pills O
may O
not O
lower O
blood O
cholesterol O
and O
studies O
that O
show O
they O
do O
may O
be O
flawed O
, O
British U-MISC
researchers O
have O
reported O
. O

A O
study O
by O
a O
team O
of O
doctors O
at O
Oxford B-ORG
University L-ORG
has O
found O
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
do O
not O
benefit O
significantly O
from O
taking O
garlic O
tablets O
. O

The O
study O
involved O
115 O
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
levels O
. O

They O
were O
given O
900 O
milligrams O
a O
day O
of O
dried O
garlic O
powder O
or O
placebo O
tablets O
. O
" O

There O
were O
no O
significant O
differences O
between O
the O
groups O
receiving O
garlic O
and O
placebo O
, O
" O
they O
wrote O
in O
the O
Journal B-ORG
of I-ORG
the I-ORG
Royal I-ORG
College I-ORG
of I-ORG
Physicians L-ORG
. O

Those O
taking O
part O
were O
told O
to O
eat O
a O
low-fat O
diet O
for O
six O
weeks O
before O
they O
started O
taking O
the O
pills O
, O
and O
their O
blood O
cholesterol O
measured O
before O
and O
after O
the O
six-week O
period O
. O

The O
researchers O
said O
this O
would O
make O
their O
findings O
more O
accurate O
. O

Several O
studies O
have O
found O
garlic O
pills O
can O
lower O
blood O
pressure O
and O
blood O
cholesterol O
. O

But O
the O
Oxford U-LOC
team O
disputed O
these O
findings O
and O
said O
either O
previous O
trials O
may O
have O
been O
interpreted O
incorrectly O
, O
those O
taking O
part O
were O
not O
given O
special O
diets O
beforehand O
or O
the O
duration O
of O
the O
studies O
may O
have O
been O
too O
short O
. O

The O
six-month O
trial O
was O
funded O
by O
the O
British B-ORG
Heart I-ORG
Foundation L-ORG
and O
Lichtwer B-ORG
Pharma I-ORG
GmbH L-ORG
, O
which O
makes O
Kwai U-MISC
brand O
garlic O
tablets O
. O

The O
study O
did O
not O
address O
whether O
whole O
garlic O
could O
affect O
cholesterol O
. O

-- O

Newsroom L-ORG

investment O
and O

, O
" O

RBA U-ORG
said O
. O

. O

BANGKOK U-LOC

Thailand U-LOC
has O
launched O
a O
manhunt O
for O
an O
Australian U-MISC
who O
escaped O
from O
a O
high O
security O
prison O
in O
Bangkok U-LOC
while O
awaiting O
trial O
on O
drug O
possession O
charges O
, O
officials O
said O
on O
Thursday O
. O

Daniel B-PER
Westlake L-PER
, O
46 O
, O
from O
Victoria U-LOC
, O
made O
the O
first O
sucessful O
escape O
from O
Klongprem U-LOC
prison O
in O
the O
northern O
outskirts O
of O
the O
capital O
on O
Sunday O
night O
. O

He O
was O
believed O
by O

officials O
to O
still O
be O
in O
Thailand U-LOC
. O

" O

have O
ordered O
a O

hunt O
for O

and O

am O
quite O
confident O
we O
will O

soon O
, O
" O

, O

director O

of O

Department L-ORG
, O
told O

. O

, O

in O

and O
charged O
with O

, O
sawed O
the O
iron O

and O

down O

's O

( O

) O

on O
a O

made O
from O
bed O

, O

said O
. O

The O

department O
was O
probing O
the O
escape O
and O
had O
ordered O
all O
foreign O
inmates O
chained O
to O
prevent O
more O
breakouts O
. O

There O
are O
266 O
Westerners U-MISC
, O
including O
six O
Australians U-MISC
, O

, O

on O

, O

. O

. O

KUALA B-LOC
LUMPUR L-LOC
1996-08-22 O

Malaysia U-LOC
has O
banned O
the O
use O
of O
nitrofuran O
, O
an O
antibiotic O
, O
in O
chicken O
feed O
and O
veterinary O

because O
it O
believes O
the O
drug O
could O
cause O
cancer O
, O
the O

ministry O
said O
on O
Thursday O
. O

" O

is O
hoped O
that O

and O

by O
the O
laws O
and O
respect O
the O

the O

, O
" O

Jui L-PER
Meng O
was O

the O
national O
Bernama U-ORG

. O

5,000 O

( O
$ O

) O
. O

, O
" O
he O

Ukraine U-LOC
hails O
peace O
as O
marks O
five-year O
independence O
. O

Rostislav B-PER
Khotin L-PER

KIEV U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Ukraine U-LOC
celebrates O
five O
years O
of O
independence O
from O
Kremlin U-LOC
rule O
on O
Saturday O
, O
hailing O
civil O
and O
inter-ethnic O
peace O
as O
its O
main O
post-Soviet U-MISC
achievement O
. O

Ukraine U-LOC
's O
declaration O
of O
independence O
in O
1991 O
, O
backed O
nine-to-one O
by O
a O
referendum O
in O
December O
of O
that O
year O
, O
effectively O
dealt O
a O
death O
blow O
to O
the O
Soviet U-MISC
empire O
and O
ended O
more O
than O
three O
centuries O
of O
rule O
from O
Moscow U-LOC
. O

Ukraine U-LOC
, O
with O
a O
Russian U-MISC
community O
of O
11 O
million O
people O
-- O
the O
world O
's O
largest O
outside O
Russia U-LOC
-- O
has O
avoided O
conflicts O
like O
those O
in O
Russia U-LOC
's O
Chechnya U-LOC
, O
neighbouring O
Moldova U-LOC
, O
and O
the O
former O
Soviet U-MISC
republics O
of O
Georgia U-LOC
, O
Azerbaijan U-LOC
and O
Tajikistan U-LOC
. O

" O
Ukraine U-LOC
's O
biggest O
achievements O
for O
five O
years O
are O
the O
preservation O
of O
civil O
peace O
and O
inter-ethnic O
harmony O
, O
" O
President O
Leonid B-PER
Kuchma L-PER
said O
in O
televised O
statement O
this O
week O
. O

" O
Unlike O
many O
other O
post-Soviet U-MISC
countries O
we O
were O
able O
to O
deal O
with O
conflict O
situations O
in O
a O
peaceful O
and O
civilised O
way O
. O
" O

But O
independence O
was O
initially O
accompanied O
by O
hyper-inflation O
and O
economic O
collapse O
, O
although O
there O
are O
signs O
of O
a O
turnaround O
. O

Inflation O
-- O
a O
hyper-inflationary O
10,300 O
percent O
a O
year O
in O
1993 O
-- O
was O
a O
respectable O
0.1 O
percent O
a O
month O
in O
June O
and O
July O
and O
the O
economy O
has O
just O
begun O
to O
grow O
. O

Kuchma U-PER
told O
a O
solemn O
ceremony O
at O
the O
Ukraina B-LOC
Palace L-LOC
on O
Friday O
that O
" O
there O
was O
a O
turning O
point O
" O
in O
reforms O
and O
that O
he O
expected O
a O
rise O
in O
the O
standard O
of O
living O
in O
the O
near O
future O
. O

" O
There O
is O
no O
doubt O
that O
economic O
growth O
has O
already O
started O
, O
" O
said O
Adelbert B-PER
Knobl L-PER
, O
head O
of O
the O
International B-ORG
Monetary I-ORG
Fund L-ORG
's O
mission O
in O
Ukraine U-LOC
. O
" O

The O
national O
bank O
and O
the O
government O
have O
every O
reason O
to O
be O
proud O
of O
their O
efforts O
. O
" O

Central O
bank O
officials O
said O
on O
Thursday O
that O
a O
much-postponed O
hryvna O
currency O
would O
" O
definitely O
" O
be O
introduced O
before O
the O
end O
of O
this O
year O
. O

It O
will O
replace O
the O
interim O
karbovanets O
currency O
, O
which O
was O
introduced O
at O
par O
to O
the O
Russian U-MISC
rouble O
in O
1992 O
but O
now O
trades O
at O
almost O
33 O
karbovanets O
per O
rouble O
. O

Ukraine U-LOC
has O
repeatedly O
promised O
to O
introduce O
the O
hryvna O
but O
had O
to O
postpone O
the O
plans O
because O
of O
economic O
problems O
. O

Proud O
of O
its O
record O
in O
promptly O
joining O
both O
the O
Council B-ORG
of I-ORG
Europe L-ORG
and O
NATO U-ORG
's O
Partnership B-MISC
for I-MISC
Peace L-MISC
, O
Ukraine U-LOC
caused O
a O
foreign O
policy O
wrangle O
this O
week O
, O
offending O
China U-LOC
by O
allowing O
a O
Taiwanese U-MISC
minister O
to O
appear O
on O
a O
public O
, O
if O
unofficial O
visit O
. O

" O

Russia U-LOC
to O

down O

. O

MOSCOW U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Russian U-MISC
officials O
, O
keen O
to O
cut O
capital O
flight O
, O
will O

tight O
measures O
to O
cut O

deals O
in O

to O
a O

, O

. O

" O

have O
always O
been O
concerned O

with O

, O

, O
" O
Marina B-PER
Volkova L-PER
, O

of O

at O

. O

Volkova U-PER
said O
last O
year O
goods O
had O
been O
exported O
under O
many O
Russian U-MISC
barter O
deals O
, O
with O
nothing O
imported O
in O
return O
. O

She O
said O
the O
cost O
of O
such O
unimported O
goods O
was O
$ O
1.10 O
billion O
in O
1995 O
. O

Barter O
deals O
were O
worth O
$ O
4.9 O
billion O
last O
year O
, O
or O
about O
eight O
percent O
of O
all O
Russian U-MISC
exports O
estimated O
at O
$ O
61.5 O
billion O
, O
she O
said O
. O

" O

cost O
of O
exported O
goods O
is O
too O
often O
understated O
, O
so O
the O
actual O
share O
of O
barter O
deals O
in O
Russian U-MISC
exports O
and O
the O
amount O
of O
unimported O
goods O
may O
be O
even O
higher O
, O
" O
Volkova U-PER
said O
. O

A O
few O
days O
ago O
Russian U-MISC
President O
Boris B-PER
Yeltsin L-PER
issued O
a O

on O
state O
regulation O
of O
foreign O

deals O
, O
and O

said O
this O
" O
could O

improve O
the O
situation O
" O
. O

In O
line O
with O
the O
decree O
, O
which O
will O
come O
into O
force O
on O
November O
1 O
, O
all O

traders O
will O
be O

to O
import O
goods O
worth O
the O
cost O
of O
their O
exports O
within O
180 O
days O
. O

" O

late O
, O

will O
have O
to O
pay O
fines O
worth O
the O
cost O
of O
their O
exported O
goods O
, O
" O
Volkova U-PER
said O
. O

cost O
of O
exported O
goods O
could O
still O

for O

, O

are O
currently O
" O

the O
issue O
" O
. O

Barter O
has O
always O
been O
a O
feature O
of O
the O
Soviet B-LOC
Union L-LOC
's O
foreign O
trade O
, O
but O

's O

for O

25-30 O

of O

because O
" O
thousands O
( O
of O
) O
trade O

which O

up O
preferred O
barter O
in O

of O

banks O
and O
money O

" O
, O

. O

" O

. O

, O
" O

. O

TENNIS O
- O

CHANDA B-PER
RUBIN L-PER
OUT O
OF O
U.S. B-MISC
OPEN L-MISC
. O

NEW B-LOC
YORK L-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Promising O
10th-ranked O
American U-MISC
Chanda B-PER
Rubin L-PER
has O
pulled O
out O
of O
the O
U.S. B-MISC
Open I-MISC
Tennis I-MISC
Championships L-MISC
with O
a O
wrist O
injury O
, O
tournament O
officials O
announced O
. O

The O
20-year-old O
Rubin U-PER
, O
who O
was O
to O
be O
seeded O
11th O
, O
is O
still O
suffering O
from O
tendinitis O
of O
the O
right O
wrist O
that O
has O

in O
recent O

. O

turned O
into O

for O
eighth-seeded O
Olympic U-MISC
champion O

. O

one O

of O
any O
of O
the O
seeded O
players O
in O
17th-ranked O
Karina B-PER

of O
Slovakia U-LOC
. O

But O

player O
in O
the O
tournament O

will O
be O
moved O
into O
Rubin U-PER
's O
slot O
in O
the O
draw O
, O
while O
Davenport U-PER
will O
now O
get O
a O
qualifier O
in O
the O
first O
round O

according O
to O

from O

1996-08-23 O

Hamburg U-LOC
side O

, O

as O

for O

their O

. O

, O
who O

ATHLETICS O
- O

SECOND O
WORLD O
RECORD O
IN O
10 O
DAYS O
. O

Adrian B-PER
Warner L-PER

BRUSSELS U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Russia U-LOC
's O
double O
Olympic U-MISC
champion O
Svetlana B-PER
Masterkova L-PER
smashed O
her O
second O
world O
record O
in O
just O
10 O
days O
on O
Friday O
when O
she O
bettered O
the O
mark O
for O
the O
women O
's O
1,000 O
metres O
. O

After O
breaking O
the O
world O
record O
for O
the O
women O
's O
mile O
in O
Zurich U-LOC
last O
Wednesday O
, O
the O
Olympic U-MISC
800 O
and O
1,500 O
metres O
champion O
clocked O
two O
minutes O
28.98 O
seconds O
over O
1,000 O
at O
the O
Brussels U-LOC
grand O
prix O
meeting O
. O

The O
Russian U-MISC

up O
the O
ground O
in O
a O
swift O
last O

to O

0.36 O
seconds O
off O

previous O
best O
of O
2:29.34 O

by O

in O

same O
stadium O
in O

last O

. O

all O
the O

, O

second O
in O

. O

But O

was O

who O
picked O
up O
the O

of O
$ O
25,000 O
for O
the O

in O

of O
a O

. O

dominated O

at O

recent O

Games L-MISC
following O
her O

to O

. O

the O

in O

Wednesday O

of O

. O

SOCCER O
- O
JORGE U-PER
CALLS O
UP O
SIX O
PORTO U-ORG
PLAYERS O
FOR O
WORLD B-MISC
CUP L-MISC
QUALIFIER O
. O

LISBON U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Portugal U-LOC
's O
new O
coach O
Artur B-PER
Jorge L-PER
called O
up O
six O
players O
from O
league O
champions O
Porto U-ORG
on O
Friday O
in O
an O
18-man O
squad O
for O
the O
opening O
World B-MISC
Cup L-MISC

CRICKET O
- O
SRI B-LOC
LANKA L-LOC
AND O
AUSTRALIA U-LOC
SAY O
RELATIONS O
HAVE O
HEALED O
. O

COLOMBO U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Sri B-LOC
Lanka L-LOC
and O
Australia U-LOC
agreed O
on O
Friday O
that O
relations O
between O
the O
two O
teams O
had O
healed O
since O
the O
Sri B-MISC
Lankans L-MISC
' O
acrimonious O
tour O
last O
year O
. O

The O
Sri B-MISC
Lankans L-MISC
were O
first O
found O
guilty O
then O
cleared O
of O
ball O
tampering O
and O
off-spinner O
Muttiah B-PER
Muralitharan L-PER
was O
called O
for O
throwing O
during O
a O
controversial O
three-test O
series O
in O
Australia U-LOC
. O

" O
Our O
concern O
is O
to O
get O
out O
there O
and O
play O
proper O

, O
" O

told O
a O

on O
the O
eve O
of O
a O

between O
the O
World B-MISC
Cup L-MISC
champions O
and O
a O

XI L-ORG

scheduled O
for O
Saturday O
. O

" O

happened O
is O
history O
. O
" O

Australian U-MISC
team O
manager O
Cam B-PER

said O
he O
agreed O
with O
Ranatunga U-PER
. O

" O
I O
believe O
relations O
between O
the O
two O
teams O
will O
be O
excellent O
, O
" O

said O
. O

The O
Australians U-MISC
are O
making O
their O
first O
visit O
to O
the O
Indian B-LOC
Ocean L-LOC
island O
since O
boycotting O
a O

Cup L-MISC
fixture O
in O
February O
after O
a O

in O

. O

have O
been O
promised O

26 O

. O

was O

with O
the O

. O

expected O

rain O

Property B-ORG
Capital L-ORG
stake O
. O

WASHINGTON U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Omaha U-LOC
billionaire O
Warren B-PER
Buffett L-PER
said O
Friday O
he O
raised O
his O
stake O
in O
Property B-ORG
Capital I-ORG
Trust L-ORG
to O
8.0 O
percent O
from O
6.7 O
percent O
. O

In O
a O
filing O
with O
the O
Securities B-ORG
and I-ORG
Exchnage I-ORG
Commission L-ORG
, O
Buffett U-PER
said O
he O
bought O
62,900 O
additional O
common O
shares O
of O
the O
Boston-based U-MISC
real O
estate O
investment O
trust O
at O
prices O
ranging O
from O
$ O
7.65 O
to O
$ O
8.02 O
a O
share O
. O

The O
purchases O
increased O
his O
holding O
in O
the O
company O
to O
725,900 O
shares O
, O
which O
was O
purchased O
for O
a O
total O
of O
$ O
6.2 O
million O
, O
he O
said O
. O

Buffett U-PER
, O
who O
is O
well-known O
as O
a O
long-term O
investor O
, O
is O
chairman O
of O
Berkshire B-ORG
Hathaway I-ORG
Inc L-ORG
, O
a O
holding O
company O
through O
which O
he O
holds O
investments O
in O
several O
large O
U.S. U-LOC
companies O
. O

Colombia U-LOC
, O
U.S. U-LOC
reach O
aviation O
agreement O
. O

MIAMI U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

The O
U.S. U-LOC
and O
Colombian U-MISC
governments O
reached O
an O
agreement O
that O
will O
allow O
AMR B-ORG
Corp L-ORG
's O
American B-ORG
Airlines L-ORG
to O
operate O
three O
round-trip O
flights O
between O
New B-LOC
York L-LOC
and O
Bogota U-LOC
, O
the O
Department B-ORG
of I-ORG
Transportation L-ORG
said O
Friday O
. O

Under O
the O
agreement O
, O
which O
followed O
talks O
in O
Miami U-LOC
this O
week O
, O
AMR U-ORG
also O
will O
be O
allowed O
to O
shift O
up O
to O
four O
of O
the O
weekly O
flights O
it O
now O
operates O
between O
Miami U-LOC
and O
Colombia U-LOC
to O
its O
New B-LOC
York L-LOC
gateway O
. O

The O
United B-LOC
States L-LOC
also O
will O
be O
able O
to O
designate O
one O
new O
all-cargo O
carrier O
for O
service O
between O
the O
two O
nations O
after O
two O
years O
. O

Colombia U-LOC
was O
permitted O
to O
add O
a O
single O
additional O
round-trip O
flight O
to O
its O
current O
New B-LOC
York L-LOC
service O
, O
although O
it O
will O
not O
be O
able O
to O
do O
so O
while O
under O
Category O
Two O
( O
Conditional O
) O
status O
under O
the O
Federal B-ORG
Aviation I-ORG
Administration L-ORG
's O
International B-MISC
Aviation I-MISC
Safety I-MISC
program L-MISC
. O

Colombia U-LOC
would O
be O
allowed O
to O
add O
new O
service O
when O
its O
safety O
assessment O
has O
been O
improved O
, O
the O
department O
said O
. O

With O
the O
exception O
of O
the O
new O
services O
just O
agreed O
to O
, O
the O
governments O
of O
the O
two O
nations O
have O
agreed O
to O
maintain O
their O
current O
level O
of O
routes O
and O
airlines O
for O
the O
next O
2-1/2 O
years O
, O
the O
agreement O
said O
. O

The O
agreement O
resolved O
a O
dispute O
that O
arose O
in O
June O
when O
Colombia U-LOC
turned O
down O
American U-ORG
's O
request O
to O
operate O
flights O
between O
New B-LOC
York L-LOC
and O
Bogota U-LOC
, O
a O

that O

States L-LOC
to O
charge O
that O
the O

were O
breaking O
a O

to O

against O
one O
of O

ACES U-ORG
. O

SYDNEY U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

World O
number O
one O
golfer O
Greg B-PER
Norman L-PER
has O
sacked O
his O
coach O
Butch B-PER
Harmon L-PER
after O
a O

season O
. O

" O

and O
I O
are O
finished O
, O
" O
Norman U-PER
told O
reporters O
on O
Thursday O
before O
the O
start O
of O
the O
World B-MISC
Series I-MISC
of I-MISC
Golf L-MISC
in O
Akron U-LOC
, O

. O

, O
a O

champion O
, O
parted O

with O

after O
drawing O
a O
blank O
in O
this O
year O
's O
four O
majors O
, O
winning O
two O
tournaments O
worldwide O
. O

The O
blonde O
Australian U-MISC
opened O
with O
a O
level O
par O
round O
of O
70 O
in O
Akron U-LOC
, O
leaving O
him O
four O
shots O
adrift O
of O
the O
leaders O
, O
Americans U-MISC
Billy B-PER
Mayfair L-PER
and O
Paul B-PER
Goydos L-PER
and O
Japan U-LOC
's O
Hidemichi B-PER
Tanaki L-PER
. O

On O
Wednesday O

described O
this O
year O
as O
his O
worst O
on O
the O
professional O
circuit O
since O
1991 O
, O
when O
he O
failed O
to O

a O
tournament O
. O

" O

application O
this O
year O
has O
been O

, O
" O

said O
. O
" O

I O
have O
n't O
been O
as O
keyed O
up O

" O

" O

Soccer O
- O
Arab U-MISC
team O
breaks O
new O
ground O
in O
Israel U-LOC
. O

Ori B-PER
Lewis L-PER

TAIBE U-LOC
, O
Israel U-LOC
1996-08-23 O

For O
the O
first O
time O
in O
Israeli U-MISC
history O
, O
an O
Arab U-MISC
team O
will O
take O
the O
field O
when O
the O
National B-MISC
League L-MISC
soccer O
season O
starts O
on O
Saturday O
. O

Hapoel B-ORG
Taibe L-ORG
fields O
four O
Jewish U-MISC
players O
and O
two O
foreign O
imports O
-- O
a O
Pole U-MISC
and O
a O
Romanian U-MISC
. O

The O
rest O
of O
the O
side O
is O
made O
up O
mainly O
of O
Moslem B-MISC
Arabs L-MISC
. O

The O
club O
, O
founded O
in O
1961 O
, O
has O
a O
loyal O
following O
in O
Taibe U-LOC
, O
an O
Arab U-MISC
town O
of O
28,000 O
in O
the O
heart O
of O
Israel U-LOC
. O

But O
away O
from O
their O
home O
ground O
, O
they O
face O
unfriendly O
crowds O
who O
taunt O
the O
players O
with O
racist O
abuse O
. O

" O
The O
very O
first O
thing O
we O
thought O
about O
after O
we O
knew O
we O
would O
be O
promoted O
was O
the O
game O
against O
Betar B-ORG
Jerusalem L-ORG
, O
" O
said O
Taibe U-ORG
supporter O
Karem B-PER
Haj I-PER
Yihye L-PER
. O

Two O
weeks O
ago O
Taibe U-ORG
, O
coached O
by O
Pole U-MISC
Wojtek B-PER
Lazarek L-PER
, O
met O
Betar U-ORG
, O
a O
club O
closely O
associated O
with O
the O
right-wing O
Likud U-ORG
party O
, O
for O
the O
first O
time O
in O
a O
Cup U-MISC
match O
in O
Jerusalem U-LOC
. O

Chants O
from O
the O
crowd O
of O
" O
Death O
to O
the O
Arabs U-MISC
" O
, O
and O
bottle-throwing O
during O
the O
game O
marred O
the O
match O
which O
ended O
in O
a O
goalless O
draw O
. O

One O
Taibe U-ORG
supporter O
required O
hospital O
treatment O
for O
cuts O
and O
bruises O
after O
a O
stone O
struck O
his O
head O
as O
he O
was O
driving O
from O
the O
stadium O
. O

" O
We O
're O
used O
to O
hearing O
the O
taunts O
of O
" O
Death O
to O
the O
Arabs U-MISC
' O
, O
" O
said O
Sameh B-PER
Haj I-PER
Yihye L-PER
, O
a O

resident O
who O
studies O
at O

's O

. O
" O

But O
we O
know O
that O
these O
are O
only O

, O

died O
from O
hearing O

. O

The O

of O
Taibe U-LOC
lacks O
the O
amenities O
of O
Jewish U-MISC

and O

long O

of O

" O

" O
60 O

) O

. O

The O

James B-PER

in O

say O

lions O
, O

of O

of O

can O

where O

ca O

. O
" O

The O

. O

Up O
to O

tonnes O
of O

held O
in O

, O

the O
world O

as O
to O
its O

and O

, O
probably O
belongs O
to O
China U-LOC
's O

state O

, O

said O
on O

. O

40,000 O
tonnes O
of O

copper O
have O
already O
been O
moved O
to O

near O
the O

, O
where O

was O

. O

the O
China B-ORG
National I-ORG
Nonferrous I-ORG

Import I-ORG
and I-ORG
Export I-ORG
Corp L-ORG
( O
CNIEC U-ORG
) O
in O

and O

. O

It O

or O
not O
the O
40,000 O
tonnes O
had O
cleared O
customs O
-- O
which O
would O

that O
the O

reserve O
, O

directly O
by O
the O
central O
government O
's O
State B-ORG
Planning I-ORG
Commission L-ORG
, O
owned O
the O

. O

Traders O
have O
said O

reserve O
could O

-- O

otherwise O
. O

But O

house O
, O

it O

. O

" O

, O

" O

" O

, O

; O

, O
" O

. O

Mystery O
has O
surrounded O

stockpile O
in O

. O

UNION L-ORG
- O

. O

PRETORIA U-LOC
, O
South B-LOC
Africa L-LOC
1996-08-24 O

SOCCER O
- O
DISAPPOINTING O
AJAX U-ORG
SLUMP O
2-0 O
AT O
HEERENVEEN U-LOC
. O

AMSTERDAM U-LOC
1996-08-24 O

Dutch U-MISC
champions O
Ajax B-ORG
Amsterdam L-ORG
faltered O
in O
their O
second O
league O
match O
of O
the O
season O
on O
Saturday O
losing O
2-0 O
away O
at O
Heerenveen U-ORG
. O

Ajax U-ORG
, O
who O
had O
a O
dismal O
series O
of O
pre-season O
results O
before O
beating O
NAC U-ORG
of O
Breda U-LOC
in O
their O
opening O
game O
, O
had O
the O
best O
of O
an O
entertaining O
first O
half O
but O
failed O
to O
break O
the O
deadlock O
. O

Eight O
minutes O
after O
the O
interval O
, O
Heerenveen U-ORG
's O
Romeo B-PER
Wouden L-PER
broke O
through O
the O
Amsterdam U-LOC
defence O
, O
left O
defender O
John B-PER
Veldman L-PER
standing O
and O
curled O
the O
ball O
beyond O
goalkeeper O
Edwin B-PER
van I-PER
der I-PER
Sar L-PER
into O
the O
Ajax U-ORG
net O
. O

Ajax U-ORG
, O
without O
injured O
defenders O
Marcio B-PER
Santos L-PER
and O
Winston B-PER
Bogarde L-PER
and O
strikers O
Jari B-PER
Litmanen L-PER
and O
Marc B-PER
Overmars L-PER
, O
then O
stepped O
up O
the O
pace O
and O
looked O
certain O
to O
equalise O
. O

But O
they O
left O
gaps O
at O
the O
back O
and O
on O
73 O
minutes O
Danish U-MISC
striker O
Jon B-PER
Dahl I-PER
Tomasson L-PER
rushed O
out O
of O
his O
own O
half O
, O
beat O
the O
Ajax U-ORG
defence O
and O
lobbed O
van B-PER
der I-PER
Sar L-PER
. O

The O
defeat O
means O
Ajax U-ORG
's O
main O
title O
contenders O
PSV B-ORG
Eindhoven L-ORG
, O
who O
beat O
the O
champions O
3-0 O
in O
the O
traditional O
league O
curtain-raiser O
, O
can O
go O
three O
points O
clear O
of O
their O
rivals O
if O
they O
beat O
Groningen U-ORG
on O
Sunday O
. O

CRICKET O
- O
RAIN O
BRINGS O
PREMATURE O
END O
TO O
SRI B-LOC
LANKA L-LOC
MATCH O
. O

COLOMBO U-LOC
1996-08-24 O

The O
one-day O
match O
between O
Sri B-LOC
Lanka L-LOC
and O
a O
World B-ORG
XI L-ORG
was O
abandoned O
on O
Saturday O
because O
of O
rain O
. O

Scores O
: O
World B-ORG
XI L-ORG
102-0 O
( O
M. B-PER
Waugh L-PER
39 O
not O
out O
, O
S. B-PER
Tendulkar L-PER
56 O
not O
out O
) O
off O
21.4 O
overs O
v O
Sri B-LOC
Lanka L-LOC
. O

British U-MISC
hostage O
in O
Chechnya U-LOC
describes O
ordeal O
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-24 O

A O
British U-MISC
aid O
worker O
, O
held O
hostage O
in O
Chechnya U-LOC
for O
nearly O
four O
weeks O
, O
said O
on O
Saturday O
a O
cocked O
Kalashnikov U-MISC
had O
been O
thrust O
into O
his O
mouth O
at O
one O
point O
during O
his O
ordeal O
. O

Michael B-PER
Penrose L-PER
, O
a O
23-year-old O
worker O
with O
the O
group O
Action B-ORG
Against I-ORG
Hunger L-ORG
, O
described O
his O
ordeal O
to O
a O
news O
conference O
when O
he O
arrived O
back O
in O
Britain U-LOC
from O
Moscow U-LOC
. O

" O
The O
worst O
period O
of O
physical O
manhandling O
was O
during O
that O
time O
when O
we O
were O
beaten O
with O
Kalashnikovs U-MISC
and O
at O
one O
point O
I O
had O
a O
Kalashnikov U-MISC
held O
to O
the O
back O
of O
my O
throat O
-- O
cocked O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

" O
For O
the O
first O
period O
we O
were O
held O
in O
a O
small O
room O
with O
no O
bed O
or O
anything O
. O

We O
had O
very O
little O
food O
and O
sometimes O
went O
two O
or O
three O
days O
without O
eating O
. O
" O

Gunmen O
seized O
Penrose U-PER
, O
who O
comes O
from O
Swerford U-LOC
in O
southern O
England U-LOC
, O
Frenchman U-MISC
Frederic B-PER
Malardeau L-PER
and O
six O
other O
hostages O
from O
their O
car O
in O
Grozny U-LOC
, O
the O
capital O
of O
Chechnya U-LOC
, O
on O
July O
27 O
. O

The O
assailants O
had O
demanded O
a O
ransom O
of O
300,000 O
pounds O
( O
$ O
465,000 O
) O
but O
no O
money O
was O
paid O
by O
the O
charity O
when O
they O
were O
released O
on O
Wednesday O
. O

The O
hostages O
were O
held O
in O
a O
house O
in O
or O
near O
Grozny U-LOC
which O
was O
bombarded O
regularly O
. O

" O
During O
the O
last O
15 O
days O
of O
being O
held O
, O
the O
fighting O
in O
Grozny U-LOC
was O
very O
close O
. O

At O
first O
it O
was O
street O
fighting O
outside O
the O
house O
and O
then O
we O
came O
under O
very O
heavy O
shelling O
and O
bombardment O
from O
conventional O
weapons O
like O
tanks O
, O
artillery O
and O
grenade O
launchers O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

Penrose U-PER
had O
been O
working O
for O
the O
charity O
which O
provides O
food O
to O
civilians O
for O
only O
a O
few O
weeks O
before O
he O
was O
captured O
. O

When O
asked O
if O
he O
would O
return O
to O
the O
mountainous O
region O
where O
rebels O
have O
been O
fighting O
Russian U-MISC
troops O
for O
full O
independence O
, O
Penrose U-PER
said O
: O
" O
Not O
for O
the O
time O
being O
. O

I O
do O
n't O
think O
it O
's O
safe O
for O
me O
. O

But O
maybe O
in O
the O
future O
, O
depending O
on O
the O
circumstances O
. O
" O

Princess O
Diana U-PER
send O
message O
to O
Mother B-PER
Teresa L-PER
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-24 O

Britain U-LOC
's O
Princess O
Diana U-PER
has O
sent O
a O
message O
to O
seriously O
ill O
Mother B-PER
Teresa L-PER
, O
the O
nun O
to O
whom O
she O
has O
turned O
several O
times O
for O
spiritual O
guidance O
. O

Diana U-PER
's O
office O
said O
on O
Saturday O
the O
princess O
had O
sent O
a O
message O
to O
the O
Nobel B-MISC
Peace I-MISC
Prize-winning L-MISC
missionary O
as O
news O
broke O
this O
week O
of O
her O
battle O
against O
heart O
problems O
and O
malaria O
. O

A O
spokeswoman O
declined O
to O
release O
details O
of O
the O
message O
. O

Diana U-PER
first O
met O
the O
Albanian-born U-MISC
missionary O
in O
Rome U-LOC
in O
1992 O
. O

She O
said O
afterwards O
that O
the O
meeting O
had O
fulfilled O
her O
" O
dearest O
wish O
" O
and O
the O
two O
women O
have O
met O
several O
times O
since O
. O

The O
princess O
, O
who O
has O
carved O
out O
a O
major O
role O
for O
herself O
as O
a O
helper O
of O
the O
sick O
and O

Adventurers O
start O
Canadian U-MISC
wilderness O
race O
. O

PEMBERTON U-LOC
, O
British B-LOC
Columbia L-LOC
1996-08-24 O

About O
350 O
adventurers O
from O
nine O
countries O
set O
out O
on O
Saturday O
to O
climb O
, O
raft O
, O
bike O
and O
run O
in O
a O
323-mile O
( O
517-km O
) O
endurance O
race O
through O
the O
Canadian U-MISC
wilderness O
. O

The O
event O
, O
called O
the O
Eco-Challenge U-MISC
, O
is O
part O
of O
a O
growing O
sport O
known O
as O
adventure O
racing O
in O
which O
competitors O
test O
their O
limits O
for O
days O
over O
a O
perilous O
wilderness O
course O
. O

" O
I O
'm O
looking O
forward O
to O
this O
race O
. O

I O
think O
it O
will O
be O
more O
physically O
challenging O
and O
we O
'll O
have O
to O
go O
up O
against O
more O
diverse O
situations O
due O
to O
the O
terrain O
, O
" O
said O
Dr. O
Michael B-PER
Stroud L-PER
, O
a O
veteran O
Eco-Challenge U-MISC
participant O
. O

The O
Eco-Challenge U-MISC
has O
been O
staged O
twice O
before O
-- O
in O
Utah U-LOC
and O
Maine U-LOC
last O
year O
-- O
and O
is O
modelled O
on O
similar O
races O
overseas O
. O

The O
70 O
teams O
in O
this O
year O
's O
race O
will O
will O
trek O
glaciers O
, O
climb O
mountains O
, O
whitewater O
raft O
, O
horseback O
ride O
, O
canoe O
and O
mountain O
bike O
along O
the O
grueling O
course O
. O

This O
year O
's O
race O
, O
the O
route O
of O
which O
was O
keep O
a O
secret O
until O
Friday O
evening O
, O
is O
being O
held O
near O
Pemberton U-LOC
, O
British B-LOC
Columbia L-LOC
, O
about O
100 O
miles O
( O
160 O
km O
) O
northeast O
of O
Vancouver U-LOC
. O

The O
area O
is O
filled O
with O
treacherous O
mountain O
peaks O
, O
ice O
fields O
and O
frigid O
waters O
. O

Organisers O
expect O
about O

of O
the O
participants O
to O
drop O
out O
or O
be O
disqualified O
before O
the O
finish O
. O

The O
hardy O

are O
expected O
to O
complete O
the O
course O
in O
about O
six O
days O
, O
with O
first-place O
finishers O
receiving O
$ O
10,000 O
in O

money O
. O

In O
the O
Eco-Challenge U-MISC
, O
competitors O
race O
in O
teams O
of O
five O
which O
must O
include O
both O

and O
women O
. O

Team O

must O
remain O
within O
100 O
yards O
( O
metres O
) O
of O
each O
other O
at O
all O
times O
and O
finish O
together O
. O

With O
racers O
carrying O
about O
40 O
pounds O
( O
18 O
kg O
) O
of O
gear O
on O
their O
backs O
, O

bones O
, O

, O

and O

are O
common O
. O

build O
software O
infrastructure O
using O
Java U-MISC
to O
make O
networked O
applications O
ubiquitious O
. O

One O
feature O
of O
the O
Java U-MISC
language O
is O
that O
small O
software O
programmes O
, O
known O
as O
" O
applets O
" O
because O
they O
are O
small O
applications O
, O
can O
be O
downloaded O
from O
the O
server O
computers O
at O
the O
centre O
of O
networks O
onto O
individual O
computers O
for O
use O
. O

In O
this O
model O
, O
individual O
computer O
users O
can O
always O
gain O
access O
to O
the O
latest O
programmes O
and O
do O
not O
need O
to O
store O
more O
software O
than O
they O
are O
currently O
using O
on O
their O
computers O
at O
any O
one O
time O
, O
also O
saving O
costs O
of O
memory O
and O
storage O
. O

Chris B-PER
Zuleeg L-PER
, O
a O
veteran O
of O
Apple U-ORG
and O
a O
former O
JavaSoft U-ORG
marketing O
manager O
, O
is O
vice O
president O
of O
marketing O
at O
Internet B-ORG
Startup L-ORG
, O
whose O
Web O
site O
is O
www.internetstartup.com O
. O

Bessemer U-ORG
has O
funded O
numerous O
Internet U-MISC
pioneers O
, O
including O
PSI B-ORG
Net L-ORG
, O
VeriSign U-ORG
and O
Individual U-ORG
. O

GOLF O
- O
MICKELSON U-PER
WINS O
FOURTH O
TITLE O
OF O
YEAR O
IN O
AKRON U-LOC
. O

AKRON U-LOC
, O
Ohio U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Phil B-PER
Mickelson L-PER
birdied O
two O
of O
the O
last O
three O
holes O
to O
win O
World B-MISC
Series I-MISC
of I-MISC
Golf L-MISC
by O
three O
strokes O
over O
Billy B-PER
Mayfair L-PER
on O
Sunday O
. O

It O
was O
the O
fourth O
tournament O
title O
this O
year O
for O
Mickelson U-PER
, O
who O
shot O
an O
even-par O
70 O
, O
after O
being O
tied O
for O
the O
lead O
with O
Billy B-PER
Mayfair L-PER
with O
three O
holes O
to O
play O
. O

Along O
with O
Mayfiar U-PER
at O
277 O
for O
the O
tournament O
were O
Steve B-PER
Stricker L-PER
, O
who O
had O
a O
68 O
, O
and O
Duffy B-PER
Waldorf L-PER
, O
with O
a O
66 O
. O

" O
It O
was O
very O
hard O
to O
sleep O
last O
night O
because O
there O
was O
so O
much O
I O
could O
accomplish O
with O
this O
win O
, O
" O
said O
Mickelson U-PER
, O
who O
had O
a O
three-stroke O
lead O
entering O
the O
third O
round O
. O
" O

This O
was O
a O
win O
I O
wanted O
very O
, O
very O
much O
. O
" O

Mickelson U-PER
's O
victory O
gave O
him O
a O
10 O
year O
exemption O
to O
the O
PGA B-MISC
Tour L-MISC
. O

The O
$ O
378,000 O
first O
place O
check O
brings O
Mickelson U-PER
back O
to O
the O
top O
of O
the O
money O
list O
with O
$ O
1,574,799 O
won O
this O
year O
. O

" O
This O
is O
a O
major O
championship O
golf O
course O
, O
and O
for O
me O
to O
perform O
well O
on O
this O
style O
of O
course O
is O
a O
big O
step O
up O
for O
me O
in O
my O
career O
and O
my O
performance O
in O
future O
majors O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

Mickelson U-PER
three-stroke O
lead O
was O
cut O
to O
two O
when O
Mayfair U-PER
birdied O
the O
course O
's O
only O
easy O
hole O
, O
the O
par O
five O
second O
hole O
, O
while O
Mickelson U-PER
three-putted O
for O
par O
from O
25 O
feet O
. O

On O
the O
back O
nine O
Mickelson U-PER
began O
driving O
erratically O
, O
and O
poor O
tee O
shots O
resulted O
in O
bogeys O
on O
the O
, O
eighth O
, O
12th O
and O
13th O
holes O
, O
bringing O
Mickelson U-PER
back O
to O
four O
under O
par O
, O
tied O
with O
Mayfair U-PER
, O
who O
had O
parred O
14 O
straight O

birdie O
on O
no.2 O
. O

Mickelson U-PER
then O
set O
up O
a O
tap O
in O
birdie O
on O
the O
16th O
, O
sending O
a O
wedge O
shot O
to O
18 O
inches O
. O

He O
had O
another O
birdie O
on O
the O
17th O
, O
where O
he O
his O
a O
6-iron O
to O
six O
feet O
. O

Mayfair U-PER
bogeyed O
the O
17th O
, O
missing O
a O
five O
foot O
par O
putt O
, O
and O
dropped O
from O
solo O
second O
place O
to O
a O
three O
way O
tie O
for O
second O
. O

It O
was O
the O
second O
successive O
year O
in O
which O
Mayfair U-PER
has O
finished O
runner O
up O
in O
this O
tournament O
. O

He O
lost O
to O
Greg B-PER
Norman L-PER
in O
sudden O
death O
last O
year O
. O

The O
defending O
champion O
was O
in O
contention O
, O
two O
behind O
Mickelson U-PER
for O
much O
of O
the O
day O
, O
until O
he O
bogeyed O
the O
13th O
and O
14th O
holes O
. O

MOTORCYCLING O
- O
JAPANESE U-MISC
WIN O
BOTH O
ROUND O
NINE U-PER
SUPERBIKE O
RACES O
. O

SUGO U-LOC
, O
Japan U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Teenager O
Yuuichi B-PER
Takeda L-PER
, O
racing O
in O
only O
his O
first O
season O
, O
outclassed O
the O
big O
names O
to O
win O
the O
first O
race O
in O
round O
nine O
of O
the O
world O
superbike O
championship O
on O
Sunday O
. O

Takeda U-PER
, O
18 O
, O
showed O
poise O
far O
beyond O
his O
years O
to O
overtake O
Australian U-MISC
Ducati U-ORG
rider O
Troy B-PER
Corser L-PER
, O
last O
year O
's O
championship O
runner-up O
, O
with O
four O
of O
the O
25 O
laps O
left O
. O

Honda U-ORG
's O
Takeda U-PER
was O
pursued O
past O
Corser U-PER
by O
the O
Yamaha U-ORG
duo O
of O
Noriyuki B-PER
Haga L-PER
and O
Wataru B-PER
Yoshikawa L-PER
with O
Haga U-PER
briefly O
taking O
the O
lead O
in O
the O
final O
chicane O
on O
the O
last O
lap O
. O

But O
Takeda U-PER
found O
one O
more O
spurt O
of O
power O
to O
just O
take O
the O
flag O
first O
with O
Haga U-PER
second O
and O
Yoshikawa U-PER
third O
. O

Haga U-PER
had O
the O
consolation O
of O
recording O
the O
fastest O
lap O
at O
147.159 O
kph O
. O

Corser U-PER
, O
who O
crashed O
during O
practice O
on O
Friday O
, O
limped O
in O
fourth O
, O
four O
seconds O
behind O
Takeda U-PER
with O
championship O
leader O
Aaron B-PER
Slight L-PER
of O
New B-LOC
Zealand L-LOC
11 O
seconds O
behind O
the O
winner O
. O

In O
the O
second O
race O
, O
Takeda U-PER
again O
challenged O
strongly O
until O
the O
fifth O
lap O
from O
the O
end O
when O
he O
crashed O
while O
running O
second O
to O
eventual O
race O
winner O
Takuma B-PER
Aoki L-PER
. O

Aoki U-PER
, O
the O
elder O
brother O
of O
reigning O
125cc O
world O
champion O
Haruchika U-PER
, O
had O
a O

with O

Kocinski L-PER
of O
the O
United B-LOC
States L-LOC
on O
a O

before O
taking O
the O

flag O
. O

led O
for O
the O
early O
laps O
before O
he O
was O

first O
by O

, O
who O
recorded O
the O
fastest O
lap O
of O
147.786 O
kph O
, O
and O
then O
by O
Takeda U-PER
. O

With O
Takeda U-PER
out O
of O
the O
race O
, O

regained O
second O
place O
but O
he O
could O
not O
overtake O
Aoki U-PER
. O

Haga U-PER
again O
was O
the O
unlucky O
rider O

third O
ahead O
of O
Slight U-PER
with O
Corser U-PER
in O
10th O
place O
. O

But O
the O
strong O

by O
the O
Japanese U-MISC
riders O
did O
not O
alter O
the O
championship O
table O

CRICKET O
- O
POLLOCK U-PER
CONCLUDES O
WARWICKSHIRE U-ORG
CAREER O
WITH O
FLOURISH O
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

South B-MISC
African L-MISC
fast O
bowler O
Shaun B-PER
Pollock L-PER
concluded O
his O
Warwickshire U-ORG
career O
with O
a O
flourish O
on O
Sunday O
by O
taking O
the O
final O
three O
wickets O
during O
the O
county O
's O
Sunday O
league O
victory O
over O
Worcestershire U-ORG
. O

Pollock U-PER
, O
who O
returns O
home O
on O
Tuesday O
for O
an O
ankle O
operation O
, O
took O
the O
last O
three O
wickets O
in O
nine O
balls O
as O
Worcestershire U-ORG
were O
dismissed O
for O
154 O
. O

After O
an O
hour O
's O
interruption O
for O
rain O
, O

then O
reached O
an O
adjusted O
target O
of O
109 O
with O
13 O
balls O
to O
spare O
and O
record O
their O
fifth O
win O
in O
the O
last O
six O
games O
. O

Warwickshire U-ORG
are O
currently O
in O
fourth O
position O
behind O
Yorkshire U-ORG
, O
Nottinghamshire U-ORG
and O
Surrey U-ORG
. O

Yorkshire U-ORG
captain O
David B-PER
Byas L-PER
completed O
his O
third O
Sunday O
league O
century O
as O
his O
side O
swept O
clear O
at O
the O
top O
of O
the O
table O
, O
reaching O
a O
career O
best O
111 O
not O
out O
against O
Lancashire U-ORG
. O

Lancashire U-ORG
's O
total O
of O
205 O
for O
eight O
from O
40 O
overs O
looked O
reasonable O
before O
Byas U-PER
put O
their O
attack O
to O
the O
sword O
, O

his O

from O
just O

and O

. O

their O

with O

overs O
to O

. O

CRICKET O
- O
RUN-OUT O
GIVES O
LEWIS U-PER
AND O
ENGLAND U-LOC
SLIM O
SATISFACTION O
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Chris B-PER
Lewis L-PER
did O
his O
best O
to O
forget O
his O
controversial O
omission O
from O
the O
England U-LOC
one-day O
squad O
on O
Sunday O
but O
could O
not O
prevent O
Pakistan U-LOC
reasserting O
their O
dominance O
in O
the O
final O
test O
at O
The B-LOC
Oval L-LOC
. O

A O
super O
piece O
of O
fielding O
by O
Lewis U-PER
, O
dropped O
as O
a O
disciplinary O
measure O
after O
arriving O
only O
35 O
minutes O
before O
the O
start O
on O
the O
fourth O
morning O
, O
provided O
the O
only O
bright O
spot O
for O
England U-LOC
as O
the O
touring O
team O
batted O
on O
to O
reach O
413 O
for O
five O
at O
the O
interval O
, O
a O
lead O
of O
87 O
. O

The O
solitary O
wicket O
to O
fall O
was O
Asif B-PER
Mujtaba L-PER
, O
run O
out O
for O
13 O
attempting O
a O
second O
run O
to O
third O
man O
where O
Lewis U-PER
was O
lurking O
with O
a O
point O
to O
prove O
. O

There O
seemed O
scant O
danger O
until O
the O
Surrey U-ORG
player O
swooped O
on O
to O
the O
ball O
and O
returned O
off O
balance O
to O
county O
team O
mate O
Alec B-PER
Stewart L-PER
who O
whipped O
off O
the O
bails O
. O

Lewis U-PER
, O
though O
, O
could O
not O
make O
similar O
waves O
with O
the O
ball O
as O
Salim B-PER
Malik L-PER
and O
Wasim B-PER
Akram L-PER
batted O
through O
the O
rest O
of O
the O
session O
with O
few O

. O

Wasim U-PER
rattled O
along O
to O
30 O
not O
out O
, O
outscoring O
his O
partner O
who O
was O
unbeaten O
on O
24 O
at O
the O
break O
, O
although O
the O
weather O
was O
again O
threatening O
to O
play O
the O
dominant O
role O
. O

arrived O
just O
as O

players O
left O
the O
field O
for O
lunch O
, O
forcing O
the O

into O
action O
yet O
again O
. O

weather O
delayed O

for O
over O

- O
ORIOLES U-ORG
SNEAK O
PAST O
ANGELS U-ORG
. O

BALTIMORE U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Rafael B-PER
Palmeiro L-PER
's O
two-out O
single O
in O
the O
sixth O
inning O
scored O
Roberto B-PER
Alomar L-PER
with O
the O
go-ahead O
run O
as O
the O
Baltimore B-ORG
Orioles L-ORG
rallied O
past O
the O
California B-ORG
Angels L-ORG
5-4 O
and O
took O
over O
the O
American B-MISC
League L-MISC
's O
wild-card O
berth O
on O
Saturday O
. O

The O
Orioles U-ORG
trailed O
4-3 O
when O
pinch-hitter O
Mike B-PER
Devereaux L-PER
led O
off O
the O
sixth O
with O
a O
triple O
against O
reliever O
Kyle B-PER
Abbott L-PER
( O
0-1 O
) O
and O
scored O
the O
tying O
run O
on O
Alomar U-PER
's O
single O
. O

After O
Brady B-PER
Anderson L-PER
sacrificed O
, O
Palmeiro U-PER
hit O
the O
first O
pitch O
into O
right O
field O
for O
a O
single O
, O
scoring O
Alomar U-PER
. O

In O
Boston U-LOC
, O
former O
Mariner B-PER
Darren I-PER
Bragg L-PER
's O
first O
career O
grand O
slam O
in O
the O
sixth O
inning O
off O
reliever O
Randy B-PER
Johnson L-PER
lifted O
the O
Boston B-ORG
Red I-ORG
Sox L-ORG
to O
their O
fifth O
win O
in O
six O
games O
, O
a O
9-5 O
victory O
over O
Seattle U-LOC
. O

" O
Just O
one O
of O
those O
things O
, O
I O
was O
just O
trying O
to O
make O
contact O
, O
" O
said O

. O
" O

The O
bases O
were O
loaded O
and O
I O
had O
two O
strikes O
. O

I O
was O
just O
trying O
to O
put O
the O
ball O
in O
play O
. O

I O
got O
the O
good O
part O
of O
the O
bat O
on O
it O
and O
it O
carried O
out O
. O
" O

In O
Cleveland U-ORG
, O
Kevin B-PER
Seitzer L-PER
's O
two-out O
single O
in O
the O
top O
of O
the O
10th O
brought O
home O
David B-PER
Hulse L-PER
with O
the O
winning O
run O
as O
the O
Milwaukee B-ORG
Brewers L-ORG
sent O
the O
Cleveland B-ORG
Indians L-ORG
to O
their O
third O
straight O
extra-inning O
defeat O
4-3 O
. O

Bob B-PER
Wickman L-PER
( O
5-1 O
) O
, O
acquired O
from O
the O
New B-ORG
York I-ORG
Yankees L-ORG
on O
Friday O
, O
earned O
the O
win O
in O
his O

debut O
despite O
allowing O
the O
tying O
run O
in O
the O
eighth O
inning O
. O

At O
Minnesota U-LOC
, O
Marty B-PER
Cordova L-PER
and O
Matt B-PER

hit O

homers O
and O
Frankie B-PER
Rodriguez L-PER

six O

over O

to O

as O

a O

- O
FERRIGATO U-PER
SPRINTS O
TO O
SECOND O
STRAIGHT O
WORLD B-MISC
CUP L-MISC
WIN O
. O

ZURICH U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Andrea B-PER
Ferrigato L-PER
of O
Italy U-LOC
sprinted O
to O
his O
second O
cycling O
World B-MISC
Cup L-MISC
win O
in O
successive O
weekends O
with O
victory O
in O
the O
Swiss U-MISC
Grand B-MISC
Prix L-MISC
on O
Sunday O
. O

Ferrigato U-PER
, O
winner O
of O
the O

Classic L-MISC
last O
Sunday O
with O
a O
one O
second O
win O
over O
Britain U-LOC
's O
Max B-PER
Sciandri L-PER
, O
posted O
a O
similarly O
narrow O
margin O
of O
victory O
again O
. O

The O
26-year-old O
Italian U-MISC
surged O
past O
compatriot O
Michele B-PER
Bartoli L-PER
and O
last O
year O

winner O
and O

of O

in O
the O

of O
the O
237km O
race O
. O

All O
three O
clocked O
the O
same O
time O
of O
five O
hours O
51 O
minutes O
, O
52 O
seconds O
. O

world O
champion O

of O

was O
in O

as O

of O

into O

for O

settled O
for O
fourth O
. O

from O

SOCCER O
- O
PSV U-ORG
BEAT O
GRONINGEN U-ORG
4-1 O
TO O
PULL O
AWAY O
FROM O
AJAX U-ORG
. O

AMSTERDAM U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Belgian U-MISC
international O
Luc B-PER
Nilis L-PER
scored O
twice O
on O
Sunday O
as O
PSV B-ORG
Eindhoven L-ORG
came O
from O
behind O
to O
beat O
Groningen U-ORG
4-1 O
in O
Eindhoven U-LOC
. O

PSV U-ORG
and O
Vitesse B-ORG
Arnhem L-ORG
are O
the O
only O
unbeaten O
teams O
after O
two O
rounds O
of O
the O
Dutch U-MISC
league O
. O

Defending O
champions O
Ajax B-ORG
Amsterdam L-ORG
were O
defeated O
2-0 O
loss O
away O
to O
Heerenveen U-ORG
on O
Saturday O
. O

Groningen U-ORG
took O
the O
lead O
in O
the O
seventh O
minute O
when O
Dean B-PER
Gorre L-PER
intercepted O
a O
back O
pass O
from O
Ernest B-PER
Faber L-PER
to O
goalkeeper O
Ronald B-PER
Waterreus L-PER
and O
shot O
home O
. O

Faber U-PER
made O
amends O
in O
the O
32nd O
minute O
when O
he O
headed O
in O
a O
corner O
to O
score O
the O
equaliser O
. O

PSV U-ORG
took O
control O
in O
the O
second O
half O
but O
could O
not O
score O
until O
Groningen U-ORG
striker O
Romano B-PER
Sion L-PER
was O
sent O
off O
in O
the O
58th O
minute O
. O

Five O
minutes O
after O
his O
dimissal O
, O
Nilis U-PER
gave O
PSV U-ORG
the O
lead O
and O
in O
the O
final O
15 O
minutes O
he O
added O
another O
as O
did O
Zeljko B-PER
Petrovic L-PER
. O

Vitesse B-ORG
Arnhem L-ORG
upstaged O
Utrecht U-ORG
1-0 O
despite O
ending O
the O
match O
with O
only O
nine O
men O
following O
the O
dismissal O
of O
defenders O
Raymond B-PER
Atteveld L-PER
and O
Erwin B-PER
van I-PER
der I-PER
Looi L-PER
. O

Gaston B-PER
Taument L-PER
scored O
twice O
and O
newly O
signed O

once O
in O

victory O
over O
Volendam U-ORG
. O

DUTCH U-MISC
CAPTAIN O
BLIND U-PER
ENDS O
INTERNATIONAL O
CAREER O
. O

AMSTERDAM U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Dutch U-MISC
soccer O
captain O
Danny B-PER
Blind L-PER
has O
decided O
to O
end O
his O
international O
career O
, O
Ajax U-ORG
spokesman O
David B-PER
Endt L-PER
said O
on O
Sunday O
. O

Endt U-PER
told O
Dutch U-MISC
news O
agency O
ANP U-ORG
that O
Blind U-PER
, O
35 O
, O
would O
no O
longer O
be O
available O
for O
selection O
for O
the O
national O
squad O
. O

The O
Ajax U-ORG
defender O
, O
who O
led O
the O
Netherlands U-LOC
into O
the O
quarter-finals O
at O
June O
's O
European U-MISC
championship O
finals O
in O
England U-LOC
, O
had O
decided O
to O
devote O
his O
attention O
to O
playing O
for O
his O
Amsterdam U-LOC
club O
, O
Endt U-PER
said O
. O

Blind U-PER
, O
who O
played O
in O
the O
1990 B-MISC
World I-MISC
Cup L-MISC
and O
the O
1992 B-MISC
European I-MISC
championship L-MISC
, O
was O
capped O
42 O
times O
for O
the O
Netherlands U-LOC
. O

. O

- O

's O

commission O
begins O

subpoenas O
this O
week O
in O
a O

to O

the O

and O

the O

of O
the O
country O

on O

. O

last O

for O

. O

Samir B-PER

MATUZICI U-LOC
, O
Bosnia U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Thousands O
of O
Moslem U-MISC
refugees O
denounced O
Bosnia U-LOC
's O
elections O
as O
a O
farce O
on O
Sunday O
because O
Serb U-MISC
incomers O
would O
be O
able O
to O
vote O
in O
their O
old O
home O
town O
, O
cementing O
partition O
of O
the O
country O
. O

They O
said O
they O
were O
ready O
to O
force O
their O
way O
back O
across O
post-war O
ethnic O
lines O
to O
Serb-held U-MISC
Doboj U-LOC
, O
one O
of O
several O
towns O
where O
NATO U-ORG
troops O
fear O
violence O
involving O
refugees O
determined O
to O
vote O
where O
they O
once O
lived O
. O

The O
refugees O
, O
rallying O
in O
Matuzici U-LOC
on O
government O
territory O
two O
km O
from O
Doboj U-LOC
in O
northeast O
Bosnia U-LOC
, O
waved O
banners O
calling O
the O

a O
farce O
staged O
by O

Nations L-ORG
and O

Union L-ORG
. O
" O

We O
demand O
to O
vote O
in O
Doboj U-LOC
, O
" O

banners O
said O
. O

Bosnia U-LOC
's O
Moslem-led U-MISC

and O

are O
angered O
by O
a O

of O

14 O

people O
to O

in O

" O

of O

. O
" O

As O
a O
result O
, O

have O
packed O
former O

majority O
towns O
with O

of O
their O
own O
or O
registered O
other O
Serbs U-MISC
to O
vote O
there O
. O

say O
that O

was O

as O

to O

as O

, O

" O

, O

Bosnian U-MISC

Ejup B-PER
Ganic L-PER
, O

, O

" O

, O

from O

( O

. O

The O
Dayton U-LOC
peace O

guaranteed O

to O
return O
to O
their O
homes O
and O

of O

across O

. O

But O

police O
, O
controlled O
by O

in O
Moslem U-MISC
, O

and O

of O
Bosnia U-LOC
, O
and O

have O
turned O

into O
virtually O

. O

The O

of O

from O

war O
are O
Moslems U-MISC
from O
the O

. O

peace O

on O
Sunday O
to O

. O

dispersed O

. O

Moslems U-MISC

have O

several O

along O

in O

to O

into O
the O

. O

Eight O
killed O
in O
Moscow U-LOC
casino O
blaze O
. O

MOSCOW U-LOC
1996-08-25 O

Eight O
people O
died O
on O
Sunday O
in O
a O
blaze O
at O
a O
Moscow U-LOC
casino O
which O
the O
fire O
service O
said O
might O
have O
been O
started O
deliberately O
, O
Interfax U-ORG
news O
agency O
said O
. O

The O
number O
of O
casinos O
has O
soared O
in O
Moscow U-LOC
since O
the O
collapse O
of O
communism O
. O

The O
mayor O
has O
said O
he O
wants O
to O
cut O
their O
number O
to O
five O
as O
part O
of O
a O
war O
against O
organised O
crime O
. O

President O
Boris B-PER
Yeltsin L-PER
signed O
a O
decree O
on O
fighting O
crime O
in O
July O
and O
handed O
wide-ranging O
powers O
to O
security O
chief O
Alexander B-PER

Corporate O
America U-LOC
taking O
new O
view O
on O
compensation O
. O

Anne B-PER
Murray L-PER

NEW B-LOC
YORK L-LOC
1996-08-23 O

Corporate O
America U-LOC
is O
planning O
major O
changes O
in O
employee O
compensation O
in O
the O
next O
few O
years O
, O
according O
to O
a O
recent O
study O
. O

What O
it O
comes O
down O
to O
is O
this O
: O
If O
you O
're O
highly O
skilled O
, O
you O
'll O
benefit O
nicely O
. O

But O
if O
you O
're O
not O
and O
cannot O
contribute O
to O
your O
employer O
's O
goals O
, O
you O
'll O
be O
paid O
less O
. O

The O
survey O
, O
conducted O
in O
late O
1995 O
and O
the O
early O
part O
of O
this O
year O
by O
management O
consulting O
firm O
Towers B-ORG
Perrin L-ORG
, O
showed O
that O
the O
focus O
will O
be O
on O
an O
employee O
's O
overall O
value O
to O
the O
company O
's O
bottom O
line O
-- O
rather O
than O
how O
well O
an O
employee O
performs O
a O
specific O
task O
. O

Presently O
, O
for O
example O
, O
if O
an O
accountant O
's O
job O
involves O
doing O
five O
specific O
tasks O
, O
he O
or O
she O
can O
expect O
a O
certain O
salary O
, O
said O
Sandra B-PER
O'Neal L-PER
, O
a O
Towers B-ORG
Perrin L-ORG
principal O
. O

In O
the O
future O
, O
the O
accountant O
will O
be O
evaluated O
solely O
on O
" O
knowledge O
, O
skill O
and O
abilities O
, O
" O
she O
said O
. O

In O
addition O
to O
using O
accounting O
skills O
, O
the O
accountant O
will O
also O
have O
to O
be O
creative O
, O
work O
well O
in O
a O
team O
, O
be O
sensitive O
to O
customer O
needs O
and O
set O
productivity O
goals O
. O

" O
The O
good O
news O
is O
, O
if O
you O
're O
highly O
skilled O
and O
have O
many O
abilities O
, O
you O
'll O
be O
paid O
more O
, O
" O
said O
O'Neal U-PER
. O

" O
The O
bad O
news O
is O
, O
if O
you O
're O
not O
skilled O
and O
ca O
n't O
contribute O
to O
a O
team O
, O
to O
customer O
service O
and O
the O
organisation O
's O
goals O
, O
you O
'll O
be O
paid O
less O
. O
" O

Of O
the O
750 O
mid-to-large O
size O
corporations O
surveyed O
, O
81 O
percent O
had O
undergone O
a O
major O
restructuring O
in O
the O
last O
three O
years O
, O
and O
more O
than O
two-thirds O
reported O
that O
productivity O
and O
profits O
were O
up O
as O
result O
. O

Next O
on O
the O
agenda O
for O
these O
firms O
is O
developing O
a O
new O
compensation O
structure O
, O
and O
78 O
percent O
report O
that O
they O
are O
considering O
a O
new O
, O
skills-based O
plan O
for O
both O
management O
and O
non-management O
employees O
. O

This O
coming O
shift O
, O
O'Neal U-PER
said O
, O
" O
is O
not O
just O
isolated O
or O
a O
fad O
. O

It O
's O
an O
inexorable O
change O
. O
" O

After O
World B-MISC
War I-MISC
II L-MISC
, O
corporations O
adopted O
a O
" O
military O
model O
" O
creating O
hierarchical O
organisations O
where O
" O
the O
concept O
of O
defined O
tasks O
worked O
great O
, O
" O
she O
said O
. O

But O
as O
the O
economy O
became O
global O
, O
customers O
were O
more O
demanding O
and O
problems O
became O
more O
complex O
. O

" O
Multi-layers O
kept O
management O
at O
a O
distance O
from O
its O
customers O
, O
" O
O'Neal U-PER
said O
. O

Now O
organisations O
must O
change O
to O
stay O
competitive O
. O

O'Neal U-PER
says O
firms O
will O
place O
a O
greater O
emphasis O
on O
teams O
and O
team O
performance O
in O
giving O
raises O
. O

If O
your O
team O
does O
well O
, O
you O
'll O
do O
well O
. O

If O
it O
does O
n't O
do O
well O
, O
do O
n't O
expect O
a O
raise O
. O

Is O
this O
fair O
to O
an O
employee O
who O
can O
go O
the O
distance O
but O
is O
on O
a O
team O
that O
ca O
n't O
keep O
up O
? O

" O
That O
's O
an O
important O
question O
we O
used O
to O
ask O
a O
lot O
, O
" O
said O
O'Neal U-PER
. O
" O

It O
's O
not O
a O
question O
we O
ask O
any O
more O
. O

The O
more O
important O
question O
is O
-- O
' O
Do O
we O
have O
results O
? O
' O

" O

To O
get O
those O
results O
, O
27 O
percent O
of O
the O
companies O
surveyed O
plan O
to O
eliminate O
base O
pay O
increases O
in O
favour O
of O
cash O
bonuses O
and O
incentives O
, O
such O
as O
employee O
and O
team O
award O
programmes O
and O
education O
. O

Companies O
that O
can O
change O
their O
culture O
and O
view O
employees O
as O
business O
partners O
will O
do O
well O
, O
O'Neal U-PER
said O
. O

For O
example O
, O
the O
survey O
rated O
some O
participants O
in O
the O
survey O
as O
" O
high-performing O
" O
companies O
, O
based O
on O
their O
return O
on O
equity O
above O
16 O
percent O
. O

Those O
companies O
also O
said O
they O
already O
offer O
employees O
variable O
pay O
and O
business O
education O
, O
give O
their O
managers O
more O
control O
over O
pay O
decisions O
and O
celebrate O
employee O
and O
team O
success O
. O

" O
They O
respect O
employees O
more O
, O
they O
trust O
employees O
more O
and O

value O
their O
employees O
more O
, O
" O
O'Neal U-PER
said O
. O

" O

to O

a O

. O

It O
will O

a O
company O

bottom O

. O
" O

most O

now O

with O

to O

" O

" O

Advanced B-ORG
Medical I-ORG
Inc. L-ORG
said O
Monday O
it O
will O
buy O
IVAC B-ORG
Medical I-ORG
Systems I-ORG
Inc. L-ORG
, O
a O
former O
Eli B-ORG
Lilly I-ORG
& I-ORG
Co L-ORG
. O

unit O
, O
for O
about O
$ O
400 O
million O
in O
cash O
, O
creating O
one O
of O
the O
world O
's O
largest O
makers O
of O
intravenous O
infusion O
therapy O
products O
. O

Under O
the O
agreement O
, O
IVAC U-ORG
and O
Advanced B-ORG
Medical L-ORG
's O
wholly O
owned O

, O
IMED B-ORG
Corp. L-ORG
, O

to O

that O
will O

and O

that O

, O

. O

will O
have O

of O
$ O
353 O
million O
. O

Advanced B-ORG
Medical L-ORG
, O
through O
IMED U-ORG
, O
is O
already O
one O
of O
the O
nation O
's O
largest O

and O

of O

pumps O
and O

products O
. O

It O
has O

in O
38 O
foreign O
countries O
. O

San B-MISC
Diego-based L-MISC
IVAC U-ORG
is O
a O
major O
provider O
of O
infusion O
systems O
and O
related O
technologies O
to O
the O
health-care O

. O

31 O
, O

RALLYING O
- O
MAKINEN U-PER
STEPS O
UP O
TITLE O
BID O
WITH O
LAKES U-MISC
WIN O
. O

JYVASKYLA U-LOC
, O
Finland U-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Tommi B-PER
Makinen L-PER
took O
a O
significant O
step O
towards O
becoming O
world O
rally O
champion O
with O
a O

in O

1000 B-MISC
Lakes I-MISC
Rally L-MISC
on O
Monday O
. O

Mitsubishi U-ORG
driver O
Makinen U-PER
stopped O
experienced O
fellow O
Finn U-MISC
Juha B-PER
Kankkunen L-PER
in O
his O

final O

of O

1,452-km O
rally O
, O

on O
the O
first O

. O

" O
This O
was O
the O
most O
difficult O
win O
- O
three O
days O
at O
125 O
percent O
effort O
, O
" O
said O
Makinen U-PER
, O
whose O
success O
completed O
his O
1,000 B-MISC
Lakes L-MISC
hat-trick O
. O

Kankkunen U-PER
was O
runner-up O
in O
his O
Toyota U-ORG
as O

's O

produced O

to O
finish O

in O

. O

Swede U-MISC

kept O

in O

for O
the O

' O
title O
with O
fifth O
place O
in O

that O

the O

to O

of O

's O

of O

SOCCER O
- O

TO O

ON O

. O

LEEDS U-LOC
, O
England U-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Winger O

from O

of O

area O

of O
the O

on O

leave O

of O

. O

of O

( O
$ O

million O
) O

handed O

for O

their O

. O

, O

in O
the O
close O

1-0 O

SWIMMING O
- O
POPOV U-PER
IN O
`SERIOUS O
CONDITION O
' O
AFTER O
STABBING O
. O

MOSCOW U-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Russian U-MISC
double O
Olympic U-MISC
swimming O
champion O
Alexander B-PER
Popov L-PER
was O
in O
a O
serious O
condition O
on O
Monday O
after O
being O
stabbed O
on O
a O
Moscow U-LOC
street O
. O

A O
doctor O
said O
it O
was O
too O
early O
to O
say O
whether O
Popov U-PER
, O
the O
only O
man O
to O
retain O
the O
Olympic U-MISC
50 O
and O
100 O
metres O
freestyle O
titles O
, O
would O
return O
to O
top-level O
sport O
. O

" O
His O
condition O
is O
serious O
, O
" O
said O
Rimma B-PER

, O
deputy O
chief O
doctor O
of O
Hospital B-LOC
No I-LOC
31 L-LOC
in O
the O
Russian U-MISC
capital O
. O
" O

But O
he O
is O
conscious O
and O
is O
talking O
and O
smiling O
. O
" O

Maslova U-PER
told O
Reuters U-ORG
she O
was O
not O
an O
expert O
in O
sports O
medicine O
, O
but O
said O
it O
was O
too O
early O
to O
judge O
Popov U-PER
's O
chances O
of O
returning O
to O
competitive O
swimming O
. O

Popov U-PER
, O
who O
won O
gold O
in O

50 O
and O
100 O
metres O
freestyle O
at O
the O
recent O
Atlanta B-MISC
Olympics L-MISC
, O
was O
stabbed O
in O
the O
abdomen O
late O
on O
Saturday O
after O
an O
argument O
with O
a O
group O
of O
roadside O

sellers O
in O
south-west O
Moscow U-LOC
. O

said O
the O
wound O
had O
affected O
a O

and O
a O

. O

Doctors O
operated O
on O
Popov U-PER
, O
24 O
, O
for O
three O
hours O
. O

Popov U-PER
told O

Sunday O
he O
was O
in O

would O

. O
" O

soon O

, O
" O

. O

, O

is O
doing O
all O
right O
, O
" O
said O
Smirnov U-PER
. O

Smirnov U-PER
said O
the O
Olympic B-MISC
Committee L-MISC
might O
ask O
the O
government O
to O
take O
measures O
to O
protect O
the O
country O
's O
best O
athletes O
, O
some O

abroad O

of O

in O

SOCCER O
- O
PLAYERS O
LEAVE O
MATCH O
EARLY O
TO O
CATCH O
PLANE O
. O

Brian B-PER
Homewood L-PER

RIO B-LOC
DE I-LOC
JANEIRO L-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Two O
key O
players O
left O
a O
Brazilian U-MISC
championship O
match O
early O
on O
Sunday O
because O
they O
had O
to O
catch O
a O
plane O
to O
Russia U-LOC
to O
play O
with O
the O
national O
team O
. O

Sao B-ORG
Paulo L-ORG
midfielder O
Andre U-PER
and O
Santos U-ORG
defender O
Narciso U-PER
were O
both O
substituted O
during O
their O
teams O
' O
game O
, O
taken O
to O
Sao B-LOC
Paulo L-LOC
airport O
and O
flown O
to O
Rio B-LOC
de I-LOC
Janeiro L-LOC
in O
a O
private O
jet O
chartered O
by O
the O
Brazilian B-MISC
Football I-MISC
Confederation L-MISC
( O
CBF U-MISC
) O
. O

At O
Rio U-LOC
, O
they O
joined O
up O
with O
the O
national O
team O
squad O
for O
the O
journey O
to O
Moscow U-LOC
, O
where O
Brazil U-LOC
will O
face O
Russia U-LOC
in O
a O
friendly O
international O
on O
Wednesday O
. O

The O
problem O
arose O
because O
the O
Sao B-ORG
Paulo-Santos L-ORG
clash O
was O
selected O
as O
the O
day O
's O
televised O
live O
match O
, O
forcing O
it O
to O
be O
put O
back O
three O
hours O
from O
the O
usual O
kickoff O
time O
. O

Santos U-ORG
suffered O
more O
from O
their O
loss O
as O
Narciso U-PER
's O
replacement O
Jean U-PER
gave O
away O
a O
penalty O
from O
which O
Sao B-ORG
Paulo L-ORG
scored O
the O
decisive O
goal O
in O
a O
2-1 O
win O
. O

Sao B-ORG
Paulo L-ORG
lead O
the O
first O
stage O
of O
the O
championship O
on O
goal O
difference O
from O
surprise O
package O
Juventude U-ORG
, O
who O
beat O
Internacional U-ORG
2-1 O
. O

Corinthians U-ORG
, O
who O
played O
in O
a O
tournament O
in O
Spain U-LOC
last O
week O
, O
also O
faced O
a O

marathon O
as O
they O
attempted O
to O
keep O
up O
with O
a O
hectic O
fixture O
list O
. O

They O
were O
due O
to O
leave O

Monday O
night O
, O
arrive O
in O
Sao B-LOC
Paulo L-LOC
on O
Tuesday O
morning O
, O
catch O
another O
plane O
to O
the O

city O
of O
Curitiba U-LOC
one O
hour O
later O
and O
then O
play O
away O
to O
Atletico B-ORG
Paranaense L-ORG
in O
the O
Brazilian U-MISC
championship O
the O
same O
evening O
. O

Botafogo U-ORG
striker O
Tulio U-PER
, O
who O
was O
overlooked O
by O
Zagalo U-PER
for O
the O
tour O
which O
also O
features O
a O
game O
away O
to O
the O

Sunday O
, O
scored O
his O
third O

in O
three O

as O
the O

a O

TENNIS O
- O
STICH U-PER
GLAD O
HE O
STAYED O
AFTER O
OPEN U-MISC
VICTORY O
. O

Richard B-PER
Finn L-PER

NEW B-LOC
YORK L-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Michael B-PER
Stich L-PER
nearly O
pulled O
out O
of O
the O
U.S. B-MISC
Open L-MISC
in O
protest O
over O
the O
men O
's O
seeding O
fiasco O
but O
the O
former O
Wimbledon U-MISC
champion O
was O
glad O
he O
stayed O
after O
sweating O
out O
a O
four-set O
win O
on O
Monday O
over O
qualifier O
Tommy B-PER
Haas L-PER
. O

" O
I O
still O
feel O
it O
's O
embarrassing O
what O
happened O
and O
I O
was O
about O
to O
pull O
out O
yesterday O
and O
say O
, O
' O
That O
's O
it O
, O
' O
" O
said O
Stich U-PER
, O
one O
of O
a O

of O

who O
cried O
foul O
over O
seeding O
procedures O
that O
forced O
an O
unprecedented O
remaking O
of O
the O
men O
's O
draw O
last O
week O
. O

" O
But O
there O
are O
so O

reasons O
to O
play O
, O
especially O
spectators O
and O
the O
kids O
who O
come O

here O
and O

to O

, O
that O
I O
decided O
to O
stay O
. O
" O

In O
a O
break O
from O
tradition O
, O
the O
Open U-MISC
did O
not O
seed O
in O
strict O
accordance O
with O
ATP U-ORG
rankings O
, O
instead O
taking O
into O
account O
other O
factors O
that O
raised O
objections O
of O
favourtism O
toward O
U.S. U-LOC
players O
. O

One O
prominent O
player O
that O
did O
not O
stay O
for O
the O
Open U-MISC
was O
French B-MISC
Open L-MISC
champion O
Yvegeny B-PER
Kafelnikov L-PER
, O
who O
after O
being O
dropped O
three O
spots O
from O
his O
ATP U-ORG
ranking O
to O
a O
seventh O
seeding O
, O
withdrew O
and O
returned O
home O
to O
Russia U-LOC
. O

Kafelnikov U-PER
had O
pulled O
out O
of O
last O
week O
's O
tournament O
with O
a O
rib O
injury O
. O

At O
a O

attended O
by O
approximately O
50 O
players O
on O
Sunday O
, O

Davis B-MISC

player O
Todd B-PER

expressed O
the O
players O
' O

at O
the O
seedings O
. O

" O

way O
the O

has O
seeded O
here O
, O

with O
the O

, O
has O

this O

Open L-MISC
in O
the O

' O

, O

that O
is O

to O

, O
" O

said O
he O
felt O

ought O
to O
have O

. O

" O

" O
