Lamonts B-ORG
Apparel L-ORG
files O
reorganization O
plan O
. O

[ O
CORRECTED O
18:00 O
GMT U-MISC
] O

KIRKLAND U-LOC
, O
Wash U-LOC
. O

1996-08-26 O

Lamonts B-ORG
Apparel I-ORG
Inc L-ORG
, O
an O
operator O
of O
42 O
family O
apparel O
stores O
in O
six O
northwestern O
states O
, O
said O
it O
has O
filed O
a O
reorganization O
plan O
in O
bankruptcy O
court O
in O
Seattle U-LOC
. O

( O
Corrects O
to O
make O
clear O
a O
reorganization O
plan O
has O
been O
filed O
) O
. O

The O
reorganization O
plan O
calls O
for O
all O
secured O
claims O
to O
be O
paid O
in O
full O
. O

Unsecured O
claims O
, O
including O
those O
of O
company O
bondholders O
, O
will O
be O
satisfied O
by O
issuing O
new O
common O
stock O
and O
warrants O
. O

Unsecured O
claims O
are O
estimated O
at O
about O
$ O
90 O
million O
. O

Lamonts U-ORG
said O
it O
plans O
to O
issue O
9 O
million O
shares O
of O
new O
common O
stock O
. O

Of O
that O
amount O
, O
4.05 O
million O
and O
5.67 O
million O
shares O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
the O
company O
's O
trade O
creditors O
. O

Between O
4.75 O
and O
3.13 O
million O
shares O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
bondholders O
and O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
and O
200,000 O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
existing O
shareholders O
in O
exchange O
for O
all O
existing O
stock O
of O
the O
company O
. O

Bondholders O
and O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
will O
receive O
warrants O
four O
about O
2.2 O
million O
shares O
when O
the O
company O
's O
market O
capitalization O
reaches O
$ O
20 O
million O
. O

Bondholders O
, O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
, O
and O
existing O
shareholders O
also O
will O
receive O
warrants O
entitling O
them O
to O
roughly O
800,000 O
shares O
when O
the O
company O
's O
market O
capitalization O
reaches O
$ O
25 O
million O
. O

Management O
will O
receive O
options O
to O
purchase O
10 O
percent O
of O
the O
company O
's O
outstanding O
common O
stock O
with O
protection O
against O
dilution O
at O
an O
option O
exercise O
price O
of O
$ O
1 O
million O
. O

Passengers O
rescued O
from O
blazing O
ferry O
off O
France U-LOC
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-26 O

More O
than O
100 O
people O
were O
safely O
evacuated O
on O
Monday O
from O
a O
ferry O
that O
caught O
fire O
soon O
after O
leaving O
Guernsey U-LOC
in O
Britain U-LOC
's O
Channel B-LOC
Islands L-LOC
, O
police O
said O
. O

Police O
said O
the O
111 O
passengers O
and O
six O
crew O
on O
board O
the O
ferry O
Trident B-MISC
Seven L-MISC
, O
owned O
by O
France U-LOC
's O
Emeraud U-ORG
line O
, O
were O
rescued O
by O
a O
variety O
of O
private O
and O
commercial O
boats O
after O
fire O
broke O
out O
in O
the O
engine O
room O
soon O
after O
it O
left O
port O
. O

An O
88-year-old O
woman O
was O
taken O
to O
hospital O
with O
leg O
injuries O
, O
according O
to O
a O
spokesman O
for O
Guernsey U-LOC
police O
. O

The O
ferry O
, O
which O
was O
towed O
into O
port O
, O
had O
been O
bound O
for O
Jersey U-LOC
, O
another O
in O
a O
cluster O
of O
small O
British-ruled U-MISC
islands O
off O
north-west O
France U-LOC
. O

OSCE U-ORG
delays O
decision O
on O
refugee O
voting O
. O

Kurt B-PER
Schork L-PER

SARAJEVO U-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Bosnia U-LOC
's O
election O
organisers O
will O
decide O
on O
Tuesday O
whether O
or O
not O
to O
postpone O
municipal O
elections O
scheduled O
as O
part O
of O
nationwide O
balloting O
, O
an O
OSCE U-ORG
spokeswoman O
said O
on O
Monday O
. O

Officials O
from O
the O
Organisation B-ORG
for I-ORG
Security I-ORG
and I-ORG
Cooperation I-ORG
in I-ORG
Europe L-ORG
( O
OSCE U-ORG
) O
are O
considering O
the O
postponement O
following O
allegations O
of O
serious O
irregularities O
in O
the O
registration O
of O
Serb U-MISC
refugees O
. O

International O
observers O
say O
the O
alleged O
irregularities O
could O
affect O
the O
outcome O
of O
voting O
for O
municipal O
assemblies O
. O

" O
Tomorrow O
... O

the O
Provisional B-ORG
Election I-ORG
Commission L-ORG
will O
consider O
the O
possible O
postponement O
of O
municipal O
elections O
only O
... O

the O
other O
elections O
will O
be O
held O
on O
September O
14 O
, O
" O
OSCE U-ORG
spokeswoman O
Agota B-PER
Kuperman L-PER
told O
reporters O
in O
Sarajevo U-LOC
. O

" O
I O
think O
that O
it O
would O
be O
very O
difficult O
to O
select O
which O
municipal O
elections O
would O
have O
to O
be O
cancelled O
. O

I O
think O
probably O
if O
the O
decision O
( O
to O
cancell O
) O
were O
to O
be O
taken O
it O
would O
probably O
be O
all O
municipal O
elections O
.. O

. O
" O

Kuperman U-PER
added O
that O
options O
other O
than O
postponement O
were O
also O
on O
the O
table O
, O
but O
she O
refused O
to O
specify O
what O
they O
were O
. O

The O
Dayton U-LOC
peace O
agreement O
gave O
the O
OSCE U-ORG
a O
mandate O
to O
organise O
Bosnian U-MISC
elections O
. O

The O
Provisional B-ORG
Election I-ORG
Commission L-ORG
is O
OSCE U-ORG
's O
top O
rule-making O
body O
for O
the O
poll O
. O

More O
than O
600,000 O
refugees O
have O
registered O
to O
vote O
in O
55 O
countries O
around O
the O
world O
, O
representing O
about O
20 O
per O
cent O
of O
Bosnia U-LOC
's O
total O
electorate O
. O

They O
are O
due O
to O
begin O
voting O
on O
Wednesday O
, O
August O
28 O
, O
just O
one O
day O
after O
the O
PEC U-ORG
is O
supposed O
to O
make O
its O
decision O
. O

Balloting O
inside O
Bosnia U-LOC
is O
scheduled O
for O
September O
14 O
, O
when O
citizens O
are O
slated O
to O
elect O
municipal O
and O
cantonal O
assemblies O
, O
separate O
Moslem-Croat U-MISC
and O
Serb U-MISC
parliaments O
, O
a O
national O
House B-ORG
of I-ORG
Representatives L-ORG
and O
a O
three-man O
Presidency O
. O

A O
Sarajevo U-LOC
daily O
newspaper O
, O
Dnevi B-ORG
Avaz L-ORG
, O
which O
is O
close O
to O
Bosnia U-LOC
's O
Moslem U-MISC
nationalist O
SDA U-ORG
party O
, O
on O
Monday O
said O
the O
OSCE U-ORG
would O
postpone O
the O
municipal-level O
elections O
until O
the O
Spring O
of O
1997 O
because O
of O
the O
refugee O
registration O
problems O
. O

SDA U-ORG
has O
a O
representative O
on O
the O
Provisional B-ORG
Election I-ORG
Commission L-ORG
. O

" O
I O
do O
n't O
know O
what O
the O
source O
of O
the O
Dnevi B-ORG
Avaz L-ORG
report O
is O
, O
but O
it O
is O
consistent O
with O
what O
I O
have O
heard O
from O
western O
diplomats O
and O
from O
inside O
the O
OSCE U-ORG
, O
" O
said O
an O
OSCE U-ORG
staff O
member O
in O
Sarajevo U-LOC
who O
asked O
not O
to O
be O
named O
. O

" O
The O
word O
is O
that O
Frowick U-PER
has O
decided O
to O
postpone O
municipal O
elections O
but O
that O
he O
will O
wait O
for O
one O
more O
session O
of O
the O
PEC U-ORG
on O
Tuesday O
to O
take O
everyone O
's O
temperature O
on O
the O
issue O
. O
" O

Ambassador O
Robert B-PER
Frowick L-PER
, O
an O
American U-MISC
, O
heads O
the O
OSCE U-ORG
mission O
in O
Bosnia U-LOC
. O

OSCE U-ORG
and O
independent O
monitors O
allege O
that O
Serb U-MISC
authorities O
have O
systematically O
discouraged O
refugees O
from O
registering O
to O
cast O
a O
ballot O
in O
the O
places O
they O
lived O
before O
the O
war O
. O

Instead O
, O
the O
refugees O
were O
said O
to O
have O
been O
directed O
by O
their O
authorities O
to O
vote O
from O
strategic O
towns O
which O
had O
Moslem U-MISC
majorities O
before O
the O
43-month O
Bosnian U-MISC
war O
, O
but O
which O
are O
now O
underpopulated O
as O
a O
result O
of O
" O
ethnic O
cleansing O
" O
. O

Diplomats O
explain O
the O
purpose O
of O
this O
electoral O
engineering O
is O
to O
secure O
Serb U-MISC
control O
over O
pivotal O
towns O
inside O
the O
49 O
per O
cent O
of O
Bosnia U-LOC
known O
as O
the O
Serb U-MISC
republic O
, O
consolidating O
through O
the O
ballot O
box O
what O
was O
initially O
taken O
in O
war O
. O

The O
top O
U.N. U-ORG
refugee O
official O
in O
the O
Balkans U-LOC
highlighted O
the O
voter O
registration O
problem O
on O
Monday O
. O

" O
Results O
of O
the O
registration O
for O
September O
elections O
herald O
a O
dismal O
future O
for O
multi-ethnicity O
in O
Bosia-Hercegovina U-LOC
, O
" O
warned O
Soren B-PER
Jessen-Petersen L-PER
, O
Special O
Envoy O
for O
the O
U.N. U-ORG
High O
Commissioner O
for O
Refugees O
in O
Former B-LOC
Yugoslavia L-LOC
. O

" O
In O
the O
run-up O
to O
elections O
, O
nationalistic O
political O
leaders O
are O
playing O
the O

Brush B-ORG

Inc L-ORG
said O
Monday O
that O
10 O
of O
24 O

involving O

since O

1 O
. O

The O
leading O
U.S. U-LOC
beryllium O
producer O
said O
in O
a O
conference O
call O
it O
has O
traditionally O
been O
pro-active O
regarding O
the O
workplace O
disease O
, O
a O

which O
can O

a O
small O
percent O
of O
people O
whose O
immune O
systems O

. O

, O

" O

- O

" O
I O
do O
n't O
think O
many O
firms O
involved O
in O
tendering O
for O
sensitive O
projects O
realise O
the O
impact O
environmental O
activity O
has O
on O
the O
cost O
of O
running O
a O
project O
. O

" O
But O
they O
are O
more O
alert O
than O
they O
were O
3-4 O
years O
ago O
. O

There O
's O
no O
doubt O
it O
's O
a O
big O
issue O
now O
. O
" O

He O
says O
the O
damage O
comes O
in O
two O
forms O
: O
" O
Tangible O
-- O
in O
the O
form O
of O
extra O
costs O
, O
additional O
security O
, O
threats O
to O
staff O
and O
the O
more O
intangible O
damage O
caused O
by O
negative O
publicity O
. O
" O

Watts U-PER
said O
the O
cost O
of O
protesting O
can O
be O
heavy O
once O
the O
company O
is O
locked O
into O
a O
contract O
. O

" O
I O
do O
often O
hear O
on O
the O
industry O
circuit O
of O
tales O
where O
the O
company O
tenders O
at O
low O
margins O
and O
the O
demonstrations O
which O
follow O
means O
they O
are O
running O
the O
project O
at O
a O
loss O
. O
" O

ARC U-ORG
says O
it O
's O
not O
just O
contractors O
in O
the O
front O
line O
but O
also O
suppliers O
like O
itself O
. O

Its O
own O
quarries O
came O
under O
attack O
after O
it O
emerged O
that O
it O
may O
be O
a O
supplier O
for O
the O
Newbury U-LOC
bypass O
. O

" O
It O
was O
called O
the O
" O
First B-MISC
Battle I-MISC
of I-MISC
the I-MISC
Newbury I-MISC
bypass L-MISC
' O
, O
" O
said O

's O
Harding U-PER
. O

" O
We O
had O
300 O
Earth B-ORG
First L-ORG
protestors O
invade O
and O

our O
site O
. O

Hundreds O
of O

of O
pounds O
( O
dollars O
) O
of O
damage O
was O

in O

. O

Plus O
there O
was O

of O
lost O

in O
future O
. O
" O

Simon B-PER
Brown L-PER
, O

at O
investement O
bank O
UBS U-ORG
, O
said O
this O
new O

has O

. O

" O

to O

about O

M3 U-LOC
link O
( O
through O

Down L-LOC
) O

. O
" O

Harding U-PER

. O
" O

As O
a O

. O
" O

London B-MISC
Carnival L-MISC
ends O
in O
high O
spirits O
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-26 O

London U-LOC
's O
annual O
Notting B-MISC
Hill I-MISC
Carnival L-MISC
, O
the O
largest O
in O
Europe U-LOC
and O
second O
in O
the O
world O
only O
to O
Rio U-LOC
, O
ended O
peacefully O
on O
Monday O
with O
an O
estimated O
800,000 O
revellers O
singing O
and O
dancing O
the O
day O
away O
in O
high O
spirits O
. O

Police O
said O
they O
made O
30 O
arrests O
and O
there O
were O
two O
stabbings O
. O

But O
there O
was O
no O
repeat O
of O
the O
ugly O
scenes O
that O
used O
to O
scar O
the O
street O
festival O
, O
and O
police O
praised O
the O
crowds O
over O
the O
two O
days O
of O
festivities O
as O
good-natured O
. O

Around O
400 O
police O
were O
wounded O
in O
riots O
in O
1976 O
when O
the O
carnival O
, O

year O
, O
acquired O
its O
darker O
reputation O
from O
which O
it O
is O
now O
only O
slowly O
recovering O
. O

Shopkeepers O
still O
board O
up O
their O
windows O
and O
many O
residents O
leave O
town O
for O
the O
weekend O
, O
but O
for O
four O
or O
five O
years O
there O
has O
been O
no O
disorder O
and O
relatively O
little O
crime O
. O

- O
GOOCH U-PER
TO O

ANOTHER O
SEASON O
FOR O
ESSEX U-LOC
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Graham B-PER
Gooch L-PER
, O
the O
43-year-old O
former O
England U-LOC
captain O
, O
is O
to O
continue O
playing O
county O
cricket O
for O
at O
least O
another O
season O
, O
his O
club O
Essex U-ORG
announced O
on O
Tuesday O
. O

Opener O
Gooch U-PER
's O
decision O
comes O
towards O
the O
end O
of O
a O
season O
in O
which O
he O
has O
underlined O
his O
consistency O
by O
becoming O
the O
leading O
scorer O
in O
Essex U-ORG
's O
history O
, O
beating O
Keith B-PER
Fletcher L-PER
's O
aggregate O
of O
29,434 O
. O

Gooch U-PER
, O
who O
retired O
from O
test O
cricket O
after O
the O
1994-95 O
tour O
of O
Australia U-LOC
but O
is O
now O
an O
England U-LOC
selector O
, O
is O
seventh O
in O
this O
season O
's O
first-class O
averages O
with O
1,429 O
runs O
at O
64.95 O
, O
having O
hit O
five O
centuries O
and O
one O
double O
century O
. O

Essex U-ORG
secretary-general O
manager O
Peter B-PER
Edwards L-PER
said O
: O
" O

is O
a O
remarkable O

in O

- O

( O

of O

. O

as O

" O

'm O

TENNIS O
- O
EDBERG U-PER
EXTENDS O
GRAND O
SLAM O
RUN O
, O
TOPPLES O
WIMBLEDON U-LOC
CHAMP O
. O

Larry B-PER
Fine L-PER

NEW B-LOC
YORK L-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Stefan B-PER
Edberg L-PER
produced O
some O
of O
his O
vintage O

on O
Tuesday O
to O

his O

run O
at O
the O
Grand B-MISC

by O

at O

U.S. B-MISC

. O

Edberg U-PER
, O

and O

Slam L-MISC
event O
of O
his O

, O
turned O
back O

at O

with O

, O

, O

. O

SOCCER O
- O
MARSEILLE U-ORG
HOLD O
AUXERRE U-ORG
TO O
GOALLESS O
DRAW O
. O

PARIS U-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Former O
European U-MISC
champions O
Marseille U-ORG
held O
French U-MISC
champions O
Auxerre U-ORG
to O
a O
goalless O
draw O
in O
a O
lacklustre O
league O
match O
on O
Tuesday O
. O

The O
bill O
looked O
promising O
but O
both O
sides O
, O
struggling O
to O
find O
their O
form O
early O
in O
the O
season O
, O
were O
disappointing O
. O

Auxerre U-ORG
, O
who O
start O
their O
European B-MISC
Cup L-MISC
campaign O
next O
week O
against O
Ajax B-ORG
Amsterdam L-ORG
, O
dominated O
the O
match O
but O
were O
unable O
to O
score O
. O

Unbeaten O
in O
four O
matches O
, O
they O
still O
trail O
leaders O
Lens U-ORG
by O
one O
point O
. O

Lens U-ORG
, O
who O
have O
won O
all O
their O
three O
league O
matches O
so O
far O
, O
host O
Montpellier U-ORG
on O
Wednesday O
night O
. O

Despite O
another O
dismal O
performance O
, O
especially O
in O
defence O
, O
Marseille U-ORG
restored O
some O
pride O
by O
keeping O
the O
reigning O
champions O
at O
bay O
after O
losing O
2-1 O
at O
home O
to O
Metz U-ORG
last O
Saturday O
. O

After O
two O
seasons O
in O
the O
second O
division O
and O
after O
taking O
on O
half O
a O
dozen O
new O
recruits O
this O
season O
, O
some O
of O
whom O
do O
not O
speak O
a O
word O
of O
French U-MISC
, O
Marseille U-ORG
are O
not O
playing O
with O
any O
fluidity O
. O

But O
German U-MISC
international O
goalkeeper O
Andreas B-PER
Koepke L-PER
again O
proved O
a O
sound O
investment O
when O
under O
pressure O
from O
the O
Auxerre U-ORG
strikers O
, O
saving O
his O
team O
with O
a O
number O
of O
fine O
parries O
. O

Marseille U-ORG
now O
lie O
seventh O
in O
the O
league O
on O
five O
points O
. O

- O
NEUCHATEL U-ORG
TO O
APPEAL O
AGAINST O
CYPRIEN U-PER
'S O
NINE-MONTH O
BAN O
. O

GENEVA U-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Swiss U-MISC
league O
leaders O
Neuchatel B-ORG
Xamax L-ORG
said O
on O
Tuesday O
they O
would O
appeal O
against O
a O
nine-month O
ban O
imposed O
on O
French U-MISC
international O
defender O
Jean-Pierre B-PER
Cyprien L-PER
for O
his O
part O
in O
a O
post-match O
brawl O
. O

Cyprien U-PER
, O
also O
fined O
10,000 O
Swiss U-MISC
francs O
( O
$ O
8,400 O
) O
, O
traded O
punches O
with O
St B-ORG
Gallen L-ORG
's O
Brazilian U-MISC
player O
Claudio B-PER
Moura L-PER
after O
a O
match O
on O
Saturday O
. O

When O
officials O
and O
coaching O
staff O
tried O
to O
intervene O
, O
Cyprien U-PER
launched O
a O
flying O
kick O
at O
Moura U-PER
, O
but O
only O
succeeded O
in O
kneeing O
St B-ORG
Gallen L-ORG
coach O
Roger B-PER
Hegi L-PER
in O
the O
stomach O
. O

Moura U-PER
, O
who O
appeared O
to O
have O
elbowed O
Cyprien U-PER
in O
the O
final O
minutes O
of O
the O
3-0 O
win O
by O
Neuchatel U-ORG
, O
was O
suspended O
for O
seven O
matches O
and O
fined O
1,000 O
francs O
( O
$ O
840 O
) O
by O
the O
Swiss U-MISC
league O
disciplinary O
committee O
. O

Club O
president O
Gilbert B-PER
Facchinetti L-PER
said O
he O
was O
astonished O
the O
committee O

arrived O
at O
its O

so O
quickly O
and O
vowed O
the O
club O
would O
appeal O
. O

Neuchatel U-ORG
coach O
Gilbert B-PER
Gress L-PER
described O
the O
incident O
as O
" O
shocking O
" O
, O
but O
said O
Moura U-PER
was O
also O
to O
blame O
. O

" O
Moura U-PER
physically O
and O
verbally O
provoked O
Cyprien U-PER
during O
the O
match O
. O

The O
referee O
could O
not O
have O
seen O
it O
or O
he O
would O
have O
punished O
him O
, O
" O

said O
. O

" O

the O

, O
Moura U-PER
threw O
the O
first O

. O

Tomorrow O
, O
if O
someone O
punches O
me O
, O

would O
not O
know O
how O
to O
react O
. O
" O

Cyprien U-PER
, O
who O
won O
his O
one O
French U-MISC
cap O
against O
Italy U-LOC
in O
February O
1994 O
, O
cannot O
play O
in O

. O

CYCLING O
- O
BUGNO U-PER
CLEARED O
OF O
DOPING O
. O

MILAN U-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Veteran O
Italian U-MISC
Gianni B-PER
Bugno L-PER
has O
been O
cleared O
of O
doping O
after O
testing O
positive O
for O
high O
levels O
of O
testosterone O
during O
the O
Tour B-MISC
of I-MISC
Switzerland L-MISC
in O
June O
, O
the O
Italian U-MISC
cycling O
federation O
said O
on O
Tuesday O
. O

" O
He O
has O
been O
cleared O
. O

The O
case O
is O
closed O
, O
" O
a O
spokesman O
said O
. O

Bugno U-PER
tested O
positive O
for O
the O
banned O
hormone O
after O
the O
fifth O
stage O
of O
the O
Tour U-MISC
, O
in O
which O
he O
finished O
third O
overall O
. O

But O
the O
spokesman O
said O
subsequent O
tests O
in O
Cologne U-LOC
proved O
his O
body O
produced O
higher-than-average O
testosterone O
levels O
naturally O
. O

Bugno U-PER
, O
who O
won O
the O
Giro B-MISC
d'Italia L-MISC
in O
1990 O
and O
two O
successive O
world O
titles O
, O
was O
banned O
for O
three O
months O
in O
1994 O
after O
testing O
positive O
for O
the O
stimulant O
caffeine O
. O

COFINEC U-ORG
SLIPS O
ON O
BUDAPEST U-LOC
BOURSE O
BUT O
FUTURE O
STRONG O
. O

Emese B-PER
Bartha L-PER

BUDAPEST U-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Expectations O
that O
Cofinec B-ORG
S.A. L-ORG
, O
the O
Hungarian U-MISC
bourse O
's O
first O
foreign O
listing O
, O
will O
report O
a O
disappointing O
first O
half O
have O
depressed O
the O
stock O
below O
its O
issue O
price O
, O
but O
analysts O
expect O
a O
rebound O
in O
the O
long O
term O
. O

" O
The O
first O
half O
of O
the O
year O
is O
unlikely O
to O
be O
as O
strong O
as O
expected O
so O
the O
company O
will O
probably O
be O
unable O
to O
reach O
its O
annual O
plan O
in O
1996 O
, O
" O
said O
Gabor B-PER
Sitanyi L-PER
, O
a O
London-based O
analyst O
for O
ING B-ORG
Barings L-ORG
. O

The O
French-registered U-MISC
packaging O
materials O
company O
, O
which O
floated O
its O
shares O
in O
Hungary U-LOC
in O
July O
, O
for O
most O
of O
the O
past O
two O
weeks O
hovered O
below O
the O
6,425 O
forints O
/ O
Global O
Depositary O
Receipts O
price O
of O
its O
initial O
offering O
, O
which O
was O
oversubscribed O
. O

The O
company O
, O
which O
asked O
for O
a O
two-week O
delay O
from O
the O
usual O
August O
15 O
deadline O
for O
reporting O
first-half O
results O
, O
closed O
on O
Tuesday O
at O
5,800 O
forints O
, O
down O
300 O
. O

" O
Cofinec U-ORG
's O
first-half O
figures O
will O
be O
... O

between O
one-third O
of O
two-fifths O
of O
its O
annual O
plan O
, O
" O
said O
Tamas B-PER
Erdei L-PER
, O
a O
Budapest-based U-MISC
analyst O
for O
ABN-AMRO B-ORG
Hoare I-ORG
Govett L-ORG
. O

Analysts O
blame O
, O
at O
least O
partly O
, O
Hungary U-LOC
's O

environment O
for O
the O
weaker O
figures O
for O
Cofinec U-ORG
which O
, O
operating O
in O
Hungary U-LOC
, O
Poland U-LOC
and O
the O
Czech B-LOC
Republic L-LOC
, O
now O
generates O
about O
55 O
to O
60 O
percent O

has O

. O

The O

Paulo L-LOC

decided O
to O

Under O

, O

would O

100 O

of O

to O

of O
state O

being O

into O
development O
banks O
. O

It O

to O

to O
50 O
percent O
of O
the O

held O
by O
state O

whose O

of O

. O

Former O
Argentine U-MISC
benevolent O
dictator O
Alejandro B-PER
Lanusse L-PER
dies O
. O

BUENOS B-LOC
AIRES L-LOC
1996-08-26 O

Alejandro B-PER
Lanusse L-PER
, O
the O
former O
dictator O
who O
ruled O
Argentina U-LOC
for O
two O
years O
, O
died O
at O
age O
78 O
on O
Monday O
. O

Lanusse U-PER
died O
after O
being O
brought O
to O
a O
hospital O
a O
week O
ago O
following O
a O
fall O
at O
home O
that O
resulted O
in O
a O
blood O
clot O
in O
the O
brain O
. O

He O
was O
operated O
on O
earlier O
in O
the O
week O
but O
failed O
to O
recover O
from O
surgery O
. O

The O
former O
dictator O
, O
who O
ruled O
from O
1971 O
to O
1973 O
, O
was O
best O
known O
for O
allowing O
Juan B-PER
Domingo I-PER
Peron L-PER
, O
Argentina U-LOC
's O
famed O
populist O
leader O
, O
to O
return O
to O
Argentina U-LOC
after O
17 O
years O
of O
forced O
exile O
. O

Lanusse U-PER
took O
over O
the O
leadership O
of O
the O
country O
after O
five O
years O
of O
dictatorship O
. O

But O
unlike O
his O
two O
predecessors O
, O
Juan B-PER
Carlos L-PER
Ongania O
and O
Marcelo B-PER
Levingston L-PER
, O
who O
ruled O
Argentina U-LOC
with O
an O
iron O
hand O
, O
Lanusse U-PER
steered O
the O
country O
toward O
democracy O
. O

That O
resulted O
in O
general O
elections O
in O
March O
1973 O
when O
the O
Peronists U-ORG
led O
by O
Hector B-PER
Campora L-PER
and O
Vicente B-PER
Solano I-PER
Lima L-PER
returned O
to O
power O
. O

Lanusse U-PER
was O
a O
candidate O
in O
the O
election O
but O
failed O
to O
defeat O
his O
old O
adversories O
and O
never O
returned O
to O
public O
office O
. O

He O
was O
imprisoned O
for O
four O
years O
in O
1951 O
for O
taking O
part O
in O
a O
coup O
attempt O
to O
overthrow O
Peron U-PER
led O
by O
General O
Benjamin B-PER
Menendez L-PER
. O

Lanusse U-PER
's O
rule O
saw O
the O
gradual O
rise O
of O
left-wing O
activism O
which O
culminated O
in O
another O
period O
of O
brutal O
Argentine U-MISC
dictatorship O
from O
1976 O
to O
1983 O
, O
during O
which O
the O
military O
launched O
its O
" O
dirty O
war O
" O
that O
resulted O
in O
10,000 O
missing O
people O
. O

In O
his O
autobiography O
published O
in O
1990 O
, O
Lanusse U-PER
described O
himself O
as O
a O
military O
man O
with O
" O
democratic O
ideas O
. O
" O

He O
was O
born O
in O
Buenos B-LOC

in O
1918 O
and O
married O
Ileana B-PER
Bell L-PER
with O
whom O
he O
had O
nine O
children O
. O

He O
entered O
the O
Military B-ORG
College L-ORG
in O
1935 O
. O

CHICAGO U-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Millfeed O
supplies O
for O
prompt O

remained O
tight O
and O
prices O
continued O
to O
move O
higher O
, O
millfeed O
dealers O
said O
. O

High-priced O
corn O
and O
increased O
demand O
for O
livestock O
feed O
continued O
to O
support O
millfeed O
prices O
in O
nearly O
all O
sectors O
. O

Flour O
mills O
sold O
much O
of O
their O
production O
through O
September O
leaving O
little O
available O
for O
prompt O
shipment O
. O

Portland U-LOC
sources O
said O
feed O
mixer O
demand O
was O
keeping O
pace O
with O
millfeed O
production O
and O
driving O
prices O
higher O
. O

Portland U-LOC
sources O
said O
with O
corn O
priced O
there O
at O
$ O
200 O
per O
ton O
and O
barley O
at O
$ O
140 O
, O

millfeeds O
at O
$ O
125 O
represent O
a O
good O
value O
. O

U.S. U-LOC
, O

said O
feed O
mixers O
continued O
to O
be O
steady O
buyers O
with O

for O
October O
to O
March O
positions O
. O

was O

$ O

per O

$ O
118 O

Nepal U-LOC
's O

government O
has O
offered O
to O
meet O
the O
country O
's O
hardline O
Maoist U-MISC
communists O
for O

in O
a O

to O
end O
an O

in O
Nepal U-LOC
's O
western O
districts O
, O

said O
on O
Tuesday O
. O

The O

oppose O

democracy O
and O
want O
to O

state O
. O

, O
" O

( O

) O

Bahadur I-PER

said O
. O

54 O
people O
have O
died O
in O

activity O
and O
in O
police O

against O

since O

, O

said O
. O

have O

of O

more O

. O

" O

" O

to O

. O

Gold I-ORG
Corp L-ORG
said O

Tuesday O
its O
takeover O
offer O
for O
Arequipa B-ORG
Resources I-ORG
Ltd L-ORG
was O

, O

93 O
percent O
of O
the O
36.3 O
million O
shares O
not O
already O
owned O
tendered O
under O
the O

, O

. O

" O

that O

ahave O

's O

" O

Peter B-PER

said O
in O
a O

. O

C$ U-MISC

deal O
means O
Barrick U-ORG
will O
own O
Arequipa U-ORG
's O
attractive O

gold O
deposit O
in O

. O

said O
details O
involving O
the O
allocation O
between O
Barrick U-ORG
shares O
and O
cash O
will O
be O
available O
shortly O
. O

's O

of O

30 O
a O
share O
or O
part O

, O

was O
Barrick U-ORG
's O
second O

to O

the O

Vancouver-based U-MISC

. O

, O

producer O
, O

its O

11 O

30 O
a O
share O

27 O
on O
August O
16 O

of O

. O

up O

12 O
million O
ounces O
. O

. O

took O

by O

, O

's O

" O

Turkey U-LOC

rebels O
kill O
two O
, O
take O
three O
hostage O
. O

ANKARA U-LOC
1996-08-27 O

Kurdish U-MISC
guerrillas O
killed O
two O
people O
and O
took O
three O
hostage O
after O
stopping O
two O
intercity O
buses O
at O
a O
roadblock O
in O
eastern O
Turkey U-LOC
, O
security O
officials O
said O
on O
Tuesday O
. O

They O
told O
reporters O
a O
group O
of O
Kurdistan B-ORG
Workers I-ORG
Party L-ORG
( O
PKK U-ORG
) O
guerrillas O
stopped O
the O
buses O
at O
a O
roadblock O
on O
the O
road O
linking O
the O
eastern O
provinces O
of O
Erzincan U-LOC
and O
Sivas U-LOC
on O
Monday O
night O
and O
forced O
the O
passengers O
to O
get O
out O
. O

The O
rebels O
killed O
one O
of O
the O
drivers O
and O
a O
passenger O
after O
checking O
the O
identities O
of O
the O
passengers O
, O
they O
said O
. O

The O
officials O
said O
the O
rebels O
set O
ablaze O
two O
buses O
and O
released O
all O
but O
three O
passengers O
. O

More O
than O
20,000 O
people O
have O
been O
killed O
in O
the O
12-year-old O
conflict O
between O
Turkish U-MISC
troops O
and O
PKK U-ORG
guerrillas O
fighting O
for O
autonomy O
or O
independence O
from O
Turkey U-LOC
. O

on O

SEC U-ORG
adopts O
rules O
to O
improve O
investor O
access O
to O
best O
stock O
prices O
. O

WASHINGTON U-LOC
1996-08-28 O

The O
Securities B-ORG
and I-ORG
Exchange I-ORG
Commission L-ORG
Wednesday O
approved O
rules O
designed O
to O
give O
stock O
market O
investors O
a O
better O
chance O
at O
getting O
the O
best O
price O
available O
for O
their O
orders O
. O

The O
so-called O
order O
handling O
rules O
, O
which O
were O
proposed O
last O
September O
, O
were O
approved O
in O
a O
4-0 O
vote O
. O

The O
new O
rules O
will O
require O
specialists O
at O
stock O
exchanges O
and O
market O
makers O
on O
Nasdaq U-MISC
to O
allow O
customers O
to O
view O
price O
quotes O
from O
other O
electronic O
trading O
systems O
that O
may O
not O
be O
readily O
available O
to O
them O
. O

The O
rules O
will O
also O
require O
that O
customer O
limit O
orders O
be O
displayed O
with O
prices O
better O
than O
those O
available O
in O
quotes O
publicly O
available O
at O
the O
time O
. O

Specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
are O
companies O
or O
individuals O
recognised O
as O
qualified O
to O
maintain O
an O
orderly O
market O
in O
a O
stock O
. O

In O
a O
limit O
order O
, O
investors O
specify O
the O
price O
at O
which O
they O
are O
willing O
to O
buy O
or O
sell O
, O
as O
opposed O
to O
a O
market O
order O
executed O
at O
prevailing O
prices O
. O

" O
These O
rules O
are O
intended O
to O
empower O
all O
investors O
, O
by O
allowing O
their O
orders O
to O
compete O
on O
a O
level O
playing O
field O
, O
and O
by O
providing O
the O
disclosure O
they O
need O
to O
make O
informed O
decisions O
, O
" O
said O
SEC U-ORG
Chairman O
Arthur B-PER
Levitt L-PER
. O

The O
SEC U-ORG
's O
goal O
, O
he O
added O
, O
was O
to O
create O
" O
one O
system O
where O
one O
price O
could O
be O
available O
to O
everybody O
. O
" O

The O
director O
of O
the O
SEC U-ORG
's O
division O
of O
market O
regulation O
, O
Richard B-PER
Lindsey L-PER
, O
said O
Wall B-LOC
Street L-LOC
firms O
will O
probably O
need O
to O
spend O
about O
$ O
7 O
million O
to O
carry O
out O
the O
improvements O
called O
for O
by O
the O
new O
rules O
. O

In O
proposing O
the O
rules O
last O
year O
, O
the O
SEC U-ORG
noted O
that O
while O
technology O
has O
improved O
, O
commonplace O
practices O
still O
existed O
that O
worked O
against O
investors O
' O
best O
interests O
. O

It O
noted O
that O
customers O
whose O
orders O
were O
not O
displayed O
lost O
the O
chance O
of O
getting O
the O
best O
possible O
price O
available O
in O
the O
market O
. O

It O
also O
cited O
the O
potential O
problem O
of O
a O
two-tiered O
market O
in O
which O
market O
makers O
quote O
one O
price O
to O
public O
investors O
while O
quoting O
better O
prices O
in O
private O
systems O
, O
thus O
robbing O
investors O
without O
access O
to O
" O
hidden O
" O
quotes O
the O
benefit O
of O
the O
best O
available O
prices O
. O

Earlier O
this O
month O
, O
the O
SEC U-ORG
settled O
charges O
of O
alleged O
malpractices O
on O
Nasdaq U-MISC
when O
the O
parent O
of O
the O
Nasdaq U-MISC
market O
, O
the O
National B-ORG
Association I-ORG
of I-ORG
Securities I-ORG
Dealers L-ORG
, O
agreed O
to O
spend O
$ O
100 O
million O
over O
five O
years O
to O
upgrade O
its O
oversight O
of O
brokers O
' O
trading O
practices O
. O

The O
SEC U-ORG
dropped O
a O
third O
proposal O
that O
would O
have O
allowed O
investors O
with O
market O
orders O

at O
a O
better O
price O
if O
there O
were O
shifts O
in O
prices O
before O
their O
orders O
were O
executed O
. O

The O
agency O
said O
it O
would O
monitor O
effects O
of O
the O
two O
new O
rules O
before O
considering O
the O
" O
price O
improvement O
" O
proposal O
again O
. O

The O
agency O
also O
proposed O
rule O
changes O
that O
would O
require O
continuous O
" O
bid O
" O
and O
" O
ask O
" O
quotations O
from O
exchange O
specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
who O
trade O
more O
than O
1 O

of O

during O

. O

The O
SEC U-ORG
's O
limit O
order O
display O
rule O
will O
mean O
a O

for O
Nasdaq U-MISC
, O
where O

have O
never O

. O

The O

, O

' O

, O

. O

. O

, O

one O

seconds O
. O

CYCLING O
- O
BOARDMAN U-PER
FULFILS O
WORLD O
RECORD O
PREDICTION O
. O

Martin B-PER
Ayres L-PER

MANCHESTER U-LOC
, O
England U-LOC
1996-08-28 O

Britain U-LOC
's O
Chris B-PER
Boardman L-PER
fulfilled O
his O
prediction O
that O
he O
would O
break O
the O
world O
4,000 O
metres O
world O
record O
in O
the O
world O
track O
cycling O
championships O
on O
Wednesday O
. O

Boardman U-PER
clocked O
four O
minutes O
13.353 O
seconds O
to O
slice O
more O
than O
six O
seconds O
from O
the O
previous O
world O
mark O
of O
4:19.699 O
set O
by O
Olympic U-MISC
champion O

- O

SOCCER O
- O
SMICER U-PER
'S O
LAST-GASP O
GOAL O
KEEPS O
LENS U-ORG
IN O
THE O
LEAD O
. O

PARIS U-LOC
1996-08-28 O

Euro B-MISC
96 L-MISC
star O
Vladimir B-PER
Smicer L-PER
of O
the O
Czech B-LOC
Republic L-LOC
scored O
at O
the O
last O
second O
for O
Lens U-ORG
, O
allowing O
them O
to O
retain O
the O
lead O
in O
the O
French U-MISC
soccer O
league O
on O
Wednesday O
. O

Smicer U-PER
pushed O
the O
ball O
home O
in O
injury O
time O
to O
lead O
his O
team O
to O
a O
3-2 O
victory O
over O
Montpellier U-ORG
, O
who O
were O
leading O
2-1 O
until O
Cameroon U-LOC
's O
Marc-Vivien B-PER
Foe L-PER
equalised O
on O
a O
header O
in O
the O
85th O
minute O
. O

The O
win O
was O
the O
fourth O
in O
as O
many O
matches O
this O
season O
for O
Lens U-ORG
, O
who O
lead O
the O
table O
on O
12 O
points O
. O

In-form O
Paris B-ORG
St I-ORG
Germain L-ORG
, O
who O
dismissed O
Nantes U-ORG
1-0 O
, O
are O
second O
with O
10 O
points O
. O

Along O
with O
Smicer U-PER
, O
Robert B-PER
Pires L-PER
was O
the O
star O
of O
the O
night O
in O
France U-LOC
, O
scoring O
the O
first O
hat-trick O
of O
the O
league O
season O
in O
Metz U-ORG
's O
3-1 O
home O
victory O
over O
neighbouring O
Strasbourg U-ORG
. O

Pires U-PER
, O
one O
of O
the O
most O
promising O
strikers O
in O
the O
country O
, O
was O
called O
up O
for O
the O
first O
time O
this O
week O
by O
French U-MISC
manager O
Aime B-PER
Jacquet L-PER
for O
a O
friendly O
against O
Mexico U-LOC
on O
Saturday O
at O
the O
Parc B-LOC
des I-LOC
Princes L-LOC
. O

Pires U-PER
scored O
first O
with O
a O
powerful O
shot O
in O
the O
35th O
minute O
before O
striking O
again O
from O
close O
range O
just O
before O
the O
break O
. O

A O
solitary O
raid O
allowed O
him O
to O
score O
his O
third O
in O
the O
74th O
. O

Smicer U-PER
's O
goal O
was O
as O
hard-won O
as O
his O
team O
's O
victory O
. O

Spurred O
by O
Foe U-PER
's O
leveller O
five O
minutes O
before O
, O

pressed O
hard O
and O
Foe U-PER
hit O
the O
crossbar O
in O
the O
dying O
seconds O
on O
another O
header O
. O

The O
ball O
bounced O
back O
to O
Smicer U-PER
's O
feet O
and O
he O
scored O
. O

Montpellier U-ORG
seized O
an O
unexpected O

thanks O
to O
Kader B-PER
Ferhaoui L-PER
in O
the O
fourth O
minute O
after O
a O

from O

goalkeeper O
Jean-Claude B-PER
Nadon L-PER
. O

The O
side O
from O
northern O
France U-LOC
, O
forced O
to O
fight O
an O
uphill O
battle O
from O
then O
on O
, O

level O
thanks O
to O
Tony B-PER

in O
the O
eighth O
minute O
but O
young O
striker O
Fabien B-PER
Lefevre L-PER
made O
it O
two O
for O
Montpellier U-ORG
five O
minutes O
later O
. O

League O
favourites O

scored O
a O

1-0 O
win O
over O
Nantes U-ORG
and O
confirmed O
they O
would O
again O

. O

. O

yet O
to O

a O

- O

FROM O

. O

COLOMBO U-LOC
1996-08-28 O

Tendulkar L-PER

a O

120 O

. O

Lanka L-LOC
, O

. O

JORNAL B-ORG
DE I-ORG
ANGOLA L-ORG

- O
Princeton B-PER
Lyman L-PER
, O
the O
U.S. U-LOC
Under-Secretary O
of O
State O
for O
International O
Organisations O
, O
will O
on O
Wednesday O
continue O
his O
work O
in O
Angola U-LOC
visiting O
Bailundo U-LOC
, O
where O
he O
should O
be O
received O
by O
Jonas B-PER
Savimbi L-PER
, O
leader O
of O
Unita U-ORG
. O

On O
Tuesday O
Lyman U-PER
participated O
in O
a O
meeting O
of O
a O
joint-commission O
where O
he O
considered O
that O
the O
Angolan U-MISC
politicians O
should O
advance O
faster O
and O
find O
a O
way O
to O
cooperate O
. O

In O
his O
opinion O
the O
quartering O
of O
Unita U-ORG
forces O
must O
be O
concluded O
in O
all O
the O
Angolan U-MISC
territory O
and O
the O
troops O
must O
be O
selected O
and O
integrated O
in O
the O
armed O
forces O
, O
the O
government O
forces O
must O
be O
concentrated O
in O
the O

units O
and O
the O

circulation O
of O
people O
and O
goods O
must O
be O
reality O
in O

the O
country O
. O

S.AFRICAN U-MISC
TRUTH O
BODY O
TO O
SUMMON O
APARTHEID O
POLICE O
. O

CAPE B-LOC
TOWN L-LOC
1996-08-28 O

South B-LOC
Africa L-LOC
's O
Truth B-ORG
and I-ORG
Reconciliation I-ORG
Commission L-ORG
said O
on O
Wednesday O
it O
would O
subpoena O
persons O
accused O
of O
human O
rights O
violations O
to O
appear O
before O
it O
. O

" O
We O
can O
subpoena O
anyone O
we O
want O
to O
, O
even O
the O
president O
of O
the O
country O
, O
" O
spokesman O
John B-PER
Allen L-PER
told O
Reuters U-ORG
. O
" O

Subpoenas O
are O
due O
to O
be O
served O
on O
a O
number O
of O
people O
this O
week O
. O
" O

Media O
reports O
have O
speculated O
that O
the O
commission O
, O
which O
is O
trying O
to O
heal O
the O
wounds O
of O
apartheid O
by O
confronting O
the O
past O
, O
could O
subpoena O
apartheid-era O
President O
P.W. B-PER
Botha L-PER
and O
former O
police O
generals O
Basie B-PER
Smit L-PER
and O
Johan B-PER
Van I-PER
Der I-PER
Merwe L-PER
. O

In O
submissions O
last O
week O
to O
the O
commission O
National B-ORG
Party L-ORG
leader O
and O
former O
president O
F.W. B-PER
De I-PER
Klerk L-PER
said O
he O
had O
received O
no O
co-operation O
from O
Botha U-PER
in O
compiling O
his O
party O
's O
report O
. O

Since O
it O
began O
work O
in O
April O
the O
commission O
has O
been O
hearing O
harrowing O
tales O
from O
the O
victims O
of O
apartheid-era O
abuses O
, O
by O
both O
the O
white O
minority O
regime O
and O
its O
opponents O
. O

It O
also O
wants O
to O
hear O
from O
those O
who O
committed O
the O
abuses O
, O
to O
whom O
it O
can O
offer O
amnesty O
in O
return O
for O
frankness O
. O

Hopes O
that O
reformed O
perpetrators O
would O
come O
forward O
voluntarily O
have O
faded O
but O
the O
commission O
has O
the O
legal O
power O
to O
force O
them O
to O
appear O
. O

Allen U-PER
declined O
to O
give O
say O
who O
would O
be O
subpoenaed O
. O

" O
At O
the O
moment O
we O
have O
a O
preliminary O
list O
of O
less O
than O
10 O
people O
, O
but O
this O
is O
just O
the O
beginning O
, O
" O
he O
said O
. O

The O
commission O
was O
set O
up O
last O
year O
to O
probe O
30 O
years O
of O
human-rights O
violations O
during O
the O
apartheid O
era O
. O

It O
is O
chaired O
by O
Nobel B-MISC
Peace L-MISC
winner O
, O
retired O
Archbishop O
Desmond B-PER
Tutu L-PER
. O

Allen U-PER
said O
the O
commission O
could O
announce O
the O
names O
of O
subpoenaed O
persons O
on O
Monday O
next O
week O
. O

LONDON U-LOC
1996-08-28 O

The O

on O
Wednesday O
lowered O
the O
noise O
limits O
for O

's O

, O
Gatwick U-LOC
and O
Stansted U-LOC

The O

, O
effective O
from O
January O
1 O
, O
1997 O

reduced O
as O
much O
as O
possible O
while O
still O

with O
international O

a O

for O
the O
Department B-ORG

. O

The O

during O

is O
trimmed O
by O
three O

to O
94 O
, O
while O

night O

" O

" O

in O

billion O

26 O

. O

this O

. O

1996-08-28 O

Above-normal O
summer O
rainfall O
in O
the O
U.S. U-LOC
High B-LOC
Plains L-LOC
has O
produced O
near-ideal O
conditions O
for O
planting O
the O
1997 O
hard O
red O
winter O
wheat O
crop O
, O
analysts O
said O
Wednesday O
. O

From O
central O
Texas U-LOC
north O
to O
Kansas U-LOC
, O

throughout O
July O
and O
August O
have O
relieved O
most O
of O
the O
drought O
conditions O
that O
plagued O
the O
region O
earlier O
this O
year O
. O

" O
Our O
moisture O
situation O
is O
excellent O
, O
especially O
for O
fall O

of O
winter O

, O
" O

, O

. O

was O
not O

on O

Plains L-LOC

" O

in O

. O

said O

as O

. O

. O

KARACHI U-LOC
, O
Pakistan U-LOC
1996-08-28 O

About O
8,000 O
protesters O
marched O
through O
Karachi U-LOC
on O
Wednesday O
demanding O
the O
removal O
of O
Pakistani U-MISC
Prime O
Minister O
Benazir B-PER
Bhutto L-PER
, O
witnesses O
said O
. O

" O

will O
march O
to O

and O
by O

we O
will O
not O
let O

and O
( O

's O

Ali L-PER
) O

escape O

, O
" O
Nawaz B-PER
Sharif L-PER
, O
leader O
of O
the O
main O

Pakistan B-ORG
Muslim I-ORG
League L-ORG
told O
a O

by O
a O

. O

Sharif U-PER
accused O

of O

and O

, O

she O
has O

in O
the O
past O
. O

said O

for O
several O

, O

. O

was O

of O
an O

campaign O

on O

14 O
, O

's O

. O

. O

( O

) O

( O

RAMESWARAM U-LOC
, O
India U-LOC
1996-08-28 O

Indian U-MISC
fishermen O
said O
on O
Wednesday O
they O
had O
been O
forced O
at O
gunpoint O
to O
ferry O
refugees O
fleeing O
the O
ethnic O
war O
in O
Sri B-LOC
Lanka L-LOC
to O
India U-LOC
, O
as O
a O

by O
more O
than O
30,000 O
fishermen O
entered O
its O
ninth O
day O
. O

" O
There O
is O
little O
we O
can O
do O
when O
at O
mid-sea O
. O

The O
LTTE U-ORG
( O
Liberation B-ORG
Tigers I-ORG
of I-ORG
Tamil I-ORG
Eelam L-ORG
) O
accosts O
us O
and O
, O
at O
the O
point O
of O
a O
gun O
, O
forces O
us O
to O
take O
refugees O
, O
" O
said O
senior O
fishermen O
leader O
P. B-PER
Arulanandam L-PER
. O

Some O
850 O
refugees O
have O
landed O
in O
recent O
weeks O
at O
the O
port O
of O
Rameswaram U-LOC
in O
the O
southern O
Indian U-MISC
state O
of O
Tamil B-LOC
Nadu L-LOC
, O
home O
to O
50 O
million O
Tamil-speaking U-MISC
people O
, O
port O
officials O
say O
. O

Rameswaram U-LOC
is O
15 O
km O
( O
10 O
miles O
) O
off O
the O
coast O
of O
Sri B-LOC
Lanka L-LOC
. O

State O
chief O
minister O
M. B-PER
Karunanidhi L-PER
has O
publicly O
welcomed O
the O
refugees O
, O
who O
are O
fleeing O
the O
13-year O
war O
between O
Tamil U-MISC
separatists O
and O
government O
troops O
that O
Colombo U-LOC
says O
has O
cost O
50,000 O
lives O
. O

But O
the O
influx O
has O
triggered O
fears O
of O
a O
repeat O
of O
the O
1980s O
when O
some O
200,000 O
refugees O
landed O
in O
Tamil B-LOC
Nadu L-LOC
. O

Intelligence O
officals O
said O
more O
than O
5,000 O
Tamils U-MISC
were O
waiting O
on O
the O
western O
coast O
of O
Sri B-LOC
Lanka L-LOC
to O
cross O
into O
India U-LOC
. O

The O
Indian U-MISC
government O
has O
warned O
its O

that O
their O
boats O
would O
be O

if O
they O
were O

. O

to O

's O

of O
three O

' O

after O

were O

. O

All B-ORG

's I-ORG
Association L-ORG

N.J. B-PER

said O
the O

would O
continue O

and O

would O
block O

and O

. O

" O

from O

( O

, O

, O
" O

. O

LTTE U-ORG
spokesmen O
could O
not O

reached O
for O

, O
but O

that O

were O

into O

across O
the O

Strait L-LOC
. O

" O
Indian U-MISC
fishermen O
come O
right O
up O
to O
Pesalai U-LOC
to O
fish O
, O
and O

, O

. O

Only O

, O
" O

Lankan L-MISC
boatman O
Chinnathambi U-PER

the O

. O

BUNOL U-LOC
, O
Spain U-LOC
1996-08-28 O

Revellers O
painted O
the O
town O
red O
on O
Wednesday O
as O
the O
1996 O
edition O
of O
the O
world O
's O
biggest O
tomato O
fight O
began O
in O
the O
eastern O
Spanish U-MISC
village O
of O
Bunol U-LOC
. O

Thousands O
of O
people O
pelted O
each O
other O
with O
armfuls O
of O
ripe O
tomatoes O
as O
streets O
, O
walls O
and O
windows O
were O
coated O
in O
a O
blood-red O
wash O
. O

A O
single O
firework O
after O
midday O
signalled O
the O
start O
of O
the O
fruit-throwing O
frenzy O
, O
during O
which O
participants O
hurl O
some O
100 O
tonnes O
of O
tomatoes O
trucked O
in O
for O
the O
occasion O
. O

Local O
historians O
say O
the O
tradition O
began O
in O
1945 O
when O
disgruntled O
locals O
began O
spontaneously O
to O
bombard O
the O
priest O
and O
mayor O
at O
the O
annual O
fiesta O
in O
Bunol U-LOC
( O
pronounced O
Boo-nee-OL U-LOC
) O
. O

The O
festival O
's O
fame O
has O
grown O
and O
now O
attracts O
between O
15,000 O
and O
20,000 O
people O
, O
many O
of O
them O
foreigners O
. O

journal O

saying O
it O
would O
be O
hard O
to O
get O
rid O
of O
the O
disease O
any O

than O
2001 O

. O

would O
be O
340 O
new O

BSE U-MISC

' O

" O

National B-ORG

, O

on O

team O

for O
a O

Larry B-PER
Fine L-PER

NEW B-LOC
YORK L-LOC
1996-08-28 O

that O

. O

BUCHAREST U-LOC

Britain U-LOC

States L-LOC

Thursday O

The O

, O

" O

, O
" O

. O

( O

) O

. O

Peter B-PER
Greste L-PER

RAO B-ORG
Gazprom L-ORG
was O

on O

at O
an O
average O
2,901.48 O
roubles O
a O

, O
up O
from O
2,891.00 O

a O
week O
ago O
, O
the O
Federal B-ORG
Securities I-ORG
Corporation L-ORG
( O
FFK U-ORG
) O
said O
. O

Starting O
price O
at O
the O
auction O
was O
2,746 O
roubles O
a O
share O
and O
the O
40 O
lots O
sold O
for O
between O
2,840 O
and O
2,998 O
roubles O
a O
share O
, O
the O

said O
in O

. O

The O
stake O
represented O
0.042 O
percent O
of O
Gazprom U-ORG
's O

. O

The O

said O
that O
since O

began O
, O
139.75 O
million O
shares O
, O
equivalent O
to O
0.59 O
percent O
of O
Gazprom U-ORG
, O
have O
changed O
hands O
. O

Gazprom U-ORG
, O
Russia U-LOC
's O
biggest O
company O
by O
market O
capitalisation O
, O
has O
massive O
reserves O
and O
potentially O
huge O
earnings O
. O

However O
, O
its O
23.6 O
billion O
shares O
are O

and O
management O
permission O
is O
required O
to O
sell O
them O
. O

Gazprom U-ORG
has O
recently O
tightened O
these O
rules O
, O
making O
it O
harder O
for O
shareholders O
to O
sell O
to O
whoever O
they O
want O
, O
when O
they O
want O
. O

The O
company O
has O
organised O
regular O
auctions O
of O
its O
shares O
to O
create O
an O
orderly O
market O
in O
the O
paper O
. O

At O
the O
first O
auction O
on O
March O
6 O
, O
shares O
sold O
for O
an O
average O
406.6 O
roubles O
each O
, O
and O
prices O
have O
been O
rising O
steadily O
since O
then O
, O
but O
the O
rise O
in O
price O
this O
week O
and O
last O
was O
much O
less O
than O
in O
previous O
auctions O
. O

, O

in O

, O
42 O
, O

had O

near O

in O

of O

of O

. O

. O

, O

Researchers O
report O
progress O
in O
muscular O
dystrophy O
. O

PHILADELPHIA U-LOC
1996-08-29 O

University B-ORG
of I-ORG
Pennsylvania L-ORG
researchers O
on O
Thursday O
said O
a O
new O
gene-therapy O
technique O
for O
treating O
muscular O
dystrophy O
disease O
had O
shown O
progress O
in O
laboratory O
animals O
. O

Word O
of O
the O
findings O
, O
to O
be O
published O
in O
the O
Oct. O
1 O
issue O
of O
the O
journal O
" O
Human B-ORG
Gene I-ORG
Therapy L-ORG
, O
" O
came O
in O
advance O
of O
the O
annual O
Jerry B-MISC
Lewis I-MISC
Labour I-MISC
Day L-MISC
weekend O
telethon O
to O
raise O
money O
for O
muscular O
dystrophy O
research O
. O

Several O
hurdles O
must O
be O
overcome O
before O
the O
method O
is O
used O
in O
human O
trials O
. O

Nevertheless O
, O
" O
a O
treatment O
based O
on O
the O
new O
strategy O
.... O
may O
have O
the O
potential O
to O
benefit O
many O
patients O
, O
" O
the O
University B-ORG
of I-ORG
Pennsylvania L-ORG
Medical O
Centre O
said O
in O
a O
release O
. O

Muscular O
dystrophy O
is O
a O
fatal O
illness O
in O
which O
the O
body O
's O
muscle O
tissue O
degenerates O
and O
is O
replaced O
by O
fat O
. O

Death O
strikes O
in O
early O
adulthood O
. O

Individuals O
with O
the O
disease O
have O
a O
non-working O
version O
of O
a O
gene O
responsible O
for O
producing O
a O
crucial O
muscle O
protein O
called O
dystrophin O
. O

In O
the O
study O
at O
the O
University O
's O
Institute B-ORG
for I-ORG
Human I-ORG
Gene I-ORG
Therapy L-ORG
, O
researchers O
altered O
a O
common-cold O
virus O
to O
carry O
a O
version O
of O
the O
working O
dystrophin O
gene O
. O

The O
virus O
, O
which O
also O
was O
altered O
to O
minimise O
its O
susceptibility O
to O
the O
immune O
system O
, O
was O
then O
injected O
into O
the O
muscle O
cells O
of O
mice O
bred O
to O
lack O
dystrophin O
genes O
. O

In O
the O
experiment O
, O
between O
30 O
to O
40 O
percent O
of O
the O
muscle O
fibers O
in O
one O
group O
of O
mice O
produced O
dystrophin O
for O
two O
weeks O
before O
diminishing O
. O

Similar O
results O
had O
been O
obtained O
previously O
in O
test-tube O
cell O
cultures O
, O
but O
not O
in O
live O
animals O
, O
the O
university O
said O
. O

The O
university O
said O
methods O
are O
still O
needed O
to O
make O
enough O
of O
the O
altered O
virus O
to O
treat O
humans O
, O
to O
further O
decrease O
the O
immune-system O
response O
to O
the O
virus O
, O
and O
to O
deliver O
the O
virus O
to O
human O
muscle O
tissue O
. O

. O

Martin B-PER

Sierra B-ORG
Semiconductor I-ORG
Corp L-ORG
jumped O
23 O
percent O
Thursday O
on O
the O
expectation O
the O
company O
would O
emerge O
as O
a O
smaller O
but O
more O
profitable O
operation O
after O
its O
planned O
exit O
from O
the O
computer O
modem O
business O
. O

The O
San B-LOC
Jose L-LOC
, O
Calif. U-LOC
, O
company O
was O
up O
2-1/8 O
at O
11-3/8 O
after O
its O
announcement O
Wednesday O
that O
it O
planned O
to O
pull O
out O
of O
the O
highly O
competitive O
modem-chip O
business O
and O
focus O
instead O
on O
the O
fast-growing O
market O
for O
computer O
networking O
equipment O
. O

" O
Certainly O
the O
company O
will O
be O
a O
much O
smaller O
company O
now O
, O
but O
it O
will O
be O
a O
more O
profitable O
business O
, O
" O
said O
analyst O
Elias B-PER
Moosa L-PER
of O
Roberston B-ORG
Stephens I-ORG
& I-ORG
Co L-ORG
. O

But O
analysts O
noted O
that O
Sierra U-ORG
still O
has O
much O
painful O
work O
ahead O
of O
it O
, O
including O
cutting O
as O

as O
150 O
jobs O
from O
its O

, O
which O
currently O
has O
500 O
people O
, O
and O
building O
up O
the O
business O
of O
its O
PMC-Sierra U-ORG
unit O
, O
which O
makes O
routing O
devices O
and O
chipsets O
for O
high-speed O
computer O

. O

The O
company O
has O
announced O
plans O
to O
take O
a O
charge O
against O
earnings O
of O
$ O
50 O
million O
to O
$ O
80 O
million O
to O

down O
the O

of O
assets O
and O

and O
cover O
severance O
payments O
. O

Scott B-PER
Randall L-PER
of O
Soundview B-ORG
Financial I-ORG
Group L-ORG
said O
the O
company O
likely O
would O
have O
difficulty O
selling O
its O
modem-chip O
business O
. O

" O

announce O
your O
intention O
to O
exit O
a O
business O
, O
it O
becomes O
a O
complete O

, O
" O
he O

. O

And O

International B-ORG
Business I-ORG

" O

. O

" O

" O

" O

. O

715 O

is O

stymies O

. O

Committee L-ORG
will O
select O

. O

a O

for O
more O
than O
150 O
years O

will O

. O

Jane B-PER
Quigley L-PER
to O
take O
the O
title O
for O
a O
second O
year O
. O

Russia U-LOC
, O
the O
only O
nation O
to O
have O
two O
riders O
in O
the O
field O
, O
made O
full O
use O
of O
their O
numerical O
superiority O
. O

Goulnara B-PER
Fatkoullina L-PER
helped O
Samokhalova U-PER
to O
build O
an O
unbeatable O
points O
lead O
before O
snatching O
the O
bronze O
medal O
. O

Quigley U-PER
, O
a O
former O
medallist O
in O
the O
points O
event O
, O
led O
the O
race O
at O
half O
distance O
. O
" O

I O
went O
so O
close O
this O
time O
, O
but O
having O
two O
riders O
certainly O
gave O
the O
Russians U-MISC
an O
advantage O
, O
" O
she O
said O
. O

The O
first O
six O
riders O
lapped O
the O
field O
, O
which O
left O
former O
world O
champion O
Ingrid B-PER
Haringa L-PER

down O

. O

. O

SOCCER O
- O
FRENCH U-MISC
DEFENDER O
KOMBOUARE U-PER
JOINS O
ABERDEEN U-ORG
. O

ABDERDEEN U-LOC
, O
Scotland U-LOC
1996-08-30 O

French U-MISC
central O
defender O
Antoine B-PER
Kombouare L-PER
has O
completed O
a O
300,000 O
pounds O
sterling O
( O
$ O
467,000 O
) O
move O
to O
Aberdeen U-ORG
from O
Swiss U-MISC
club O
Sion U-ORG
, O
the O
Scottish U-MISC
premier O
division O
club O
said O
on O
Friday O
. O

Kombouare U-PER
has O
signed O
a O
two-year O
contract O
and O
will O
make O
his O
debut O
against O
Morton U-PER
in O
the O
Scottish B-MISC
League I-MISC
Cup L-MISC
on O
Tuesday O
. O

But O
he O
will O
be O
ineligible O
for O
the O
rest O
of O
Aberdeen U-ORG
's O
UEFA B-MISC
Cup L-MISC
campaign O
as O
he O
has O
already O
played O
for O
Sion U-ORG
in O
this O
season O
's O
Cup B-MISC
Winners I-MISC
' I-MISC
Cup L-MISC
. O

Aberdeen U-ORG
manager O
Roy B-PER
Aitken L-PER
said O
: O
" O
It O
's O
unfortunate O
for O
us O
that O
Antoine U-PER
cannot O
play O
in O
Europe U-LOC
but O
he O
will O
help O
us O
achieve O
things O
in O
domestic O
competition O
. O

" O
I O
have O
been O
watching O
him O
for O
several O
weeks O
now O
and O
have O
no O
doubts O
he O
brings O
real O
quality O
to O
the O
side O
. O

He O
has O
a O
great O
deal O
of O
experience O
and O
I O
'm O
sure O
he O
will O
quickly O
establish O
himself O
in O
both O
the O
team O
and O
the O
affection O
of O
our O
fans O
. O
" O

The O
32-year-old O
defender O
played O
seven O
seasons O
with O
Nantes U-ORG
and O
was O
with O
Paris B-ORG
St I-ORG
Germain L-ORG
for O
five O
seasons O
. O

He O
said O
former O
PSG U-ORG
team O
mate O
David B-PER
Ginola L-PER
, O
who O
now O
plays O
for O
English U-MISC
premier O
league O
Newcastle U-ORG
, O
was O
influential O
in O
his O
move O
to O
Scotland U-LOC
. O

" O
I O
'm O
a O
very O
good O
friend O
of O
David U-PER
and O
spoke O
to O
him O
recently O
about O
coming O
to O
Aberdeen U-ORG
and O
he O
was O
very O
positive O
about O
it O
, O
" O
Kombouare U-PER
said O
. O

" O
He O
said O
I O
would O
really O
enjoy O
life O
there O
and O
that O
I O
would O

in O
in O
